12121211421111.content:
Tim sniffles before letting out all the twars being built up. He was scared, very scared. But most of all - "I sowi Kewi! I dint men to twet you wike zat" Tim cries, now remorseful over his actions.

Kelly gasped, realizing now how angry she got. She looks in dread at her crying father, the sight was breaking her heart. Without a second thought, the 14 year old grabs her toddler father and hugs him tightly. "Don't cry Daddy. It's ok. It's ok. I wasn't trying to be mean."

The toddler looks up to his daughter. "You hate me nah?"

"Dad no!!! Don't say that. I love you, more than anything!" Kelly replies, tightening her arms around ger father, "but you can't just go acting like that. It's not nice to disrespect people". She was talking to her own father as though he really were just a little child.

"I not kno wat cam ovah me Kewi. I juz fwee zo confuzd abot evwithin" whimpers Tim.

"So that's what this was all about" Kelly realizes. The sudden regression from forty-something to four was very hard on Tim. Being reduced to a mere 4 year old must have triggered and brought out the more childish parts of her father, which he had otherwise grown out of. Kelly shifts her father in her arms so that he'd be looking directly at her. "Daddy I know this must all be very hard for you to deal with. I'd probably be doing the same if I was in your shoes. But try to see the positives of this" Kelly says to her father

"Wik wat?" asks Tim

"Well I could be carrying a baby in my arms instead" replies Kelly. "Although I bet you would make a cute baby Daddy"

Tim abruptly shakes his head "No. Me no babi. Me wike 4 bettah" he insists. Kelly giggles at her father's childish reaction. Tim looks up at her again. "Do yu fohgif me Kewi?" Tim asks shyly

"Yes, I forgive you." Kelly replies before kissing her father on the forehead. "I love you"

"I wuf ya too" says Tim, hugging Kelly.

"Still hungry?" asks Kelly. Tim nods. "I'll clean this up afterwards" she adds. So lunch went more smoothly this time around. Afterwards Tim watched some tv while his oldest daughter cleaned up his mess from earlier.

The 14 year old was all in her glory and carried her father into the kitchen and got out some apple sauce and chicken nuggets. Once the nuggets were in the microwave Kelly saw the sad look on her fathers toddler face as he stairs out into the distance obviously reflecting on the events unfolding.
Kelly shifts him in her arms and gives him a kiss and hugs him tight.
"Daddy I'm not going to lie I'm super excited to take care of you plus its like I got a promotion in the family but I love you and promise to be the best big sister to you!" Kelly said happily but had to adjust her grip on her father feeling like he's gotten heavier.

"Yeth" Anna replied politely

"She's coming here" Anna replies

Before long a young woman arrives, picking up Anna. "So who's the new friend you made sweety" the woman asks

"I'm Nancy, Tim's... mother. My boy and your daughter were having a lot of fun"

Anna's mother replies..
121212114212.title: Tim introduces his new 'best friend'

choices: Nancy and Sarah make a connection - more than friends that is
1212121142121.content:
Anna's mother was more than happy invite Nancy and Tim over to her house, sending Nancy her address. "Thanks" says Nancy "sorry I don't think I ever asked you your name, how rude of me".

"No problem, my name is Sarah" says Anna's mom.

Sarah's place was not too far from the park. When Nancy arrived with Tim, Sarah warmly welcomed them into the house. Inside, Nancy and Sarah set Tim and Anna in the living room to play while they chat.

"hey Sarah, can I tell you something?" Nancy says.

"Sure" Sarah replies.

Nancy felt she could trust Sarah for some reason, so she explained Tim's condition - especially that Tim was actually her husband but shrunken back into a toddler. Sarah was in disbelief, think that Nancy was taking advantage of her kindess. But when Nancy showed her an older photo of Tim and saw how much he looked like the littlr boy by Anna, she realized Nancy was telling the truth.

"Oh my God! I'm in the same situation as you are" says Sarah

"What do you mean?" Asks Nancy.

Sarah scoots up close to Nancy - rather too close - and shows Nancy her hand. "See a wedding ring" Sarah asks, though it was clear that it was a rhetorical question - for there was no ring on her finger. "You see Anna is actually my Mom" Sarah explains, showing an old photo of her mother " but she got the same virus your little husband got and shrunk into a 4 year old"

"Really" Nancy comments in awe "how long has she been like this?"

"A few months. They called me when she regressed since I was her closest relative. And I didn't want her to get sent off to some steanger's family so I've been taking care of her as my own daughter - although I get the feeling she's forgotten that I'm her daughter"

"Wow, funny I've met someone at the park whose teenage daughter turned into a little boy, and he didn't remember having been a teenage girl" Nancy brings up

"Oh, you met Emma?"

"Wait you know her?"

"From the meetings. There's this support group for parents or anyone whose loved ones were victims of the AR virus. I go to every meeting."

"Maybe I should go, for my little Timmy" Nancy says, looking at her toddlerfied husband playing with Anna.

"Sounds good, I'll send you the address and time of thr group" replies Sarah.

The two mothers continue to chat as their "children" continue to play.

"We have to get going sweety" Nancy replies. She buckles her toddler husband into the booster seat and kisses his forehead. Starting the car, Nancy looks in the rear-view mirror and sees Tim quietly staring out the window, probably at his own reflection - especially because he stuck his tongue out. "Ie no suppoz to be witta" he whines. Turning his head to Nancy, he says "Tis wisb iz annowin. Can ze doctahs fis me Nancee?"

Nancy, recalling the mother she met at the park, decided there was no point in sugarcoating the situation. "I'm not gonna lie sweety. I don't think there's any going back from this". Tim became silent yet again.

On the way home, Nancy decided to treat Tim to a happy meal and ice cream for lunch. "Tis not much" Tim says, however despite his words the toddler ended up satisfied with his food and the ice cream made him feel a little better. "Tsanks" says Tim.

"You're welcome" Nancy replies

Once the car was parked in front of their house, Nancy lifted Tim out of the car seat and hugged him tightly. "Ok sweety, we are about to meet with our children. I know you must feel anxious about the kids seeing you like this, so I'll keep you close by me if that helps" Nancy says while shifting her husband in her arms. The toddler nods quietly, timid but willing to go face whatever fate awaited him.

Inside the house Nancy and Tim, who was clinging onto Nancy tightly, are greeted by

121212114212132.content:
Several weeks have passed by since Tim's regression into a 4 year old. Since then Nancy has been attending the support group, making friends with the other members. She brings Tim along to play with the other AR'ed children. At first she was anxious in front of thr group but with some help from Sarah she opened up to her fellow support group friends. She and Sarah also got more comfortable with one another - both Brad and Kelly suspect that Sarah might be flirting with their mother.

Meanwhile Tim, as Nancy thought would happen, showed more and more signs of mental regression.

...

"Mommy?" asks Tim

"Yes sweety?" says Nancy

"Kimi wunt weev me awon" says Tim. He was strapped firmly in his booster seat, stuck between Brad and an all too eager Kimmy.

"I just wanna play Daddy" replies Kimmy, still tugging on her daddy-turned-baby-brother's hair.

"Buh iz hutz" whines Tim. Even the former father could only take so much of his youngest daughter - though he wasn't really mentally an adult anymore. "Mommy, plez tew Kimi ta zop!" The toddler whines to his former wife.

"Kimmy" Nancy says, her voice firm and authoritive. Kimmy stopped what she was doing upon hearing her mother's voice.

"Sorry Daddy" Kimmy apologizes. She was the only one who still called Tim by "Daddy"; everyone else just called him "Timmy" or some cutesy nickname like "sweety".

"Iz owkwa Kimi. I fowgif ya" Tim replies, smiling at Kimmy.

The toddler wanted to reached out (as far as the booster seat allowed) to hug Kimmy, but out of nowhere a flash of light hits him.

"Ahhh, you two look so adorable" comments Kelly from the front, phone in her hand.

"Kewi, twat waz ta bwite!" whines Tim, who was still rubbing his eyes from the camera flash.

"But you're always so cute I can't help it. Just look at you!" Kelly says before bringing her phone up to her siblings faces.

Tim looked at the photo of him and Kimmy. "Im zo tinwee" comments Tim.

"Yep, you are quite the little bundle, 'BABY BROTHER'" Kelly says while pinching her former father's cheeks. The latter never liked it when the former pinched his cheeks like that. He preferred Brad rubbing his hair.

"Mommy, wha we gowing?" Tim asks curiously.

"Daddy, why are you calling Mommy 'Mommy' too?" Kimmy hijacks

"Becuz shez my Mommy" Tim replies with glee. Ever since the regression Tim would address Nancy as "Mommy". This was mostly for when out in public- although sometimes his family wondered if he was forgotting that his "Mommy" used to be his wife.

"But she's my Mommy and you're my Daddy" Kimmy insists

"And ya my big sistah Kimi" Tim tells Kimmy.

Nancy chuckles at their little exchange. "Well Mommy's taking you all somewhere special"

"Wike wat?" Tim asks

"You'll see"

"Aw... we ...de yed?"

"It will be a few hours before we arrive"

"Wha not naw!" shouts Tim. He was now kicking his feet back in forth, impatient about when they will be wherever it was they were going. "Go quickah Mommy!" he kepted yelling. This annoyed not just Brad or Kelly, who was trying to listen to her music, but Nancy too; it was becoming very difficult for her to focus on the road while hearing her former husband's tantrum.

"Sweety we will ge there when we get there" Nancy firmly responds. She was trying very hard to not get agitated at her former husband, but he proved to be quite a handful ever since his regression. Fortunately the tone of her voice was enough to make the little boy quiet.

"Sowwieee" Tim sheepishly apologizes.

"I forgive you sweety." Nancy replies

"I wuv ya Mommy"

"I love you too sweety". Nancy missed being able to love her husband in a "special" way, however little Timmy was still her special little sweetheart. Sometimes she wondered if the man-turned-tot ever recalled the "special ways" in which they would love eachother, or if his regressed mind was now too innocent to remember, or understood, such things.

"I azo wuv cawwing ya Mommy" Tim adds

Nancy chuckles. "I know"

Tim, not wanting to upset his "Mommy", waited patiently for this suprise "Mommy" had for him. However as he sat idly, it became more and more difficult for him to stay awake. The vibrations of the car speeding through the highway were very soothing to his small body. Before long, the man-turned-tot was sound asleep, strapped firmly into his booster seat.

Kelly quietly takes a picture of her sleeping father (turning off the flash so that he wouldn't wake up). After cueing over the photo, Kelly turns to her mother. "Mom, do you think Dad will ever change back to his proper age?" She asks

"Yes"

"Really? What makes you think so?"

"Because every little boy grows up" Nancy jokes.

"So I guess that means Dad is stuck like this?" Kelly comments.

"Afraid so." Nancy answers "but this isn't neccesarily a bad thing. Just a big change that's all"

"So where are we going exactly?" Kelly asks

Nancy replies "well since Tim is asleep, I'm taking us to -"

"Timmy come here. You need your sunblock" Nancy calls to her former husband. The man-turned-tot sat in his wife-turned-mother's lap as she rubbed the sunblock on his back. He eyed both Brad and Kelly, who were already enjoying themselves, and grew impatient.

"Huwwi upp!" Tim yells

"Buh ewi wons out tah!" whines Tim. He shut his eyes as the sticky sunblock was applied to his face.

"I'm here and so is Kimmy" says Nancy, Kimmy was sitting right next to her building sandcastles. Nancy finishes the face and says "just one more spot" and rubs a little sunblock on Tim's legs - and then lightly tickles the tot's feet. She liked making Tim giggle, and it always put him in a good mood. "There all done. Stay close to Kelly, ok?" Nancy tells Tim.

But the tot just stands in front of Nancy. "Yah wook pwetti Mommy" Tim comments, looking at the light-blue one-piece swimsuit Nancy was wearing. Even considering his regression, he was blushing.

"Awwww, thank you sweety" replies Nancy, who places a big kiss on Tim's forehead. The toddler still stood there, looking timid and lost in thought. Nancy knew quickly what her Timmy was probably thinking. Even though he had mentally regressed into a 4 year old too, Tim still very clearly remembered when Nancy had been his wife and hoe much he loved her - loved her in such a way that was impossible for him now. Leaning forward to Tim, Nancy says "you can still kiss me here if you want", turning her cheek towards Tim. The tot's eyes widened so Nancy simply nodded, her cheek waiting for Tim's lips.

The 4 year old Tim was a little nervous, but taking a good look at Nancy in her swimsuit allowed him to muster up his courage. 4 year old Tim leaned in and kiss Nancy on the cheek.

"Aww thanks handsome" teases Nancy who pulls Tim for a hug. The latter was giggling again. "So you wanna play in the ocean?" asks Nancy

Tim shakes his head and says "I wanna stah here fah naw", snuggling up against Nancy, sitting in her lap as her embrace tightened a little.

"Ok sweet" Nancy says as she watches the waves with her little Timmy.

An hour had passed, Kelly and Brad were still in the water while Nancy watched Kimmy and Timmy build sandcastles. Nancy kept the two under her supervision. When it looked like Kimmy's castle had fallen, which upsetted Timmy, Nancy decided to join in the help build a better sandcastle. The mother was able to show her youngest daughter and former husband how to make a strong sand castle, afterwards Kimmy and Timmy did whatever they wanted with it as Nancy watched. Both Kimmy and Timmy were having fun, Nancy smiled at the two.

Nancy always loved children. Perhaps part of it was that her own children reminded her of her own days as a youthful child. Days she sometimes wished she could relive, had it not been for the responsibilities she had as a mother (and especially the added responsibility of raising her tot husband). She didn't mind being an adult - though she honestly wouldn't mind being a young adult again.

Looking in the distance she notices a group of men flirting with women. She starts wondering, now that Tim is more of a son to her than husband, about dating again - which was the actual reason she decided to take the kids to the beach. She knew there would a lot of young handsome men out about. There was one concern she had however, a concern she was reminded of as her looks down at her own body. "I'm getting old" she thinks to herself; she had become rather insecure about her age for a while now. Sure she wasn't like old old, but she was getting old nevertheless. While she could have looked for middle-aged men as potential partners, Nancy had become attracted to younger men - "or I could always try dating younger women too" Nancy thinks to herself, Sarah coming to mind. She looks at herself again. "Does Sarah think I'm old?" Nancy thinks to herself, "maybe she'd like me more if I was younger - heck if I was as young as those young girls in their 20s over their I'd be able to pick one of those men" she thinks again.

Nancy then realizes that both Kelly and Brad are returning to their spot at the beach. She knew she could always leave Kelly in charge if she decided to pick up a date here - given that they stay at their cabin considering she was only 14 (as much as Kelly wanted to pretend she was an adult).

She waves at Kelly and Brad when...

12121211421213213121.content:
The pain finally stopped, and Kimmy was finally able to sit up. Her family surrounded her, speechless and in shock. "Mommy am I sick?" Kimmy asks, only to cover her mouth right after. Her voice sounded funny. And that was when she realized that her body felt different, and everything looked smaller too. There was also something else.

"What happened to my swimsuit?"



The entire family made it back to their hotel room without causing much disturbance. Now that they had privacy, the entire family, save for Tim who was taking a nap, sat at the table. "Sweety, how do you feel?" Nancy asks, staring anxiously alongside Brad and Kelly at Kimmy.

"My tummy don't hurt anymore" Kimmy replies, oblivious to the shock on her mom's and siblings' faces. Kimmy stretches her arms back, noticing how long her arms were now. "Look at how big I've grown" she says. The 5 year old was a 5 year old no more.

"You literally a grown up now!" shouts Brad

"You're probably around 18 now sweety" explains Nancy

"No fair! I can't believe my little sister's an adult before me!" complains Kelly, who was particularly jealous of Kimmy's now fully developed body. "She's even bigger than me!" she adds, looking enviously at Kimmy's chest.

"Of course I am silly" laughs Kimmy, oblivious to her ... assets... Kimmy gets up from the table to look at herself in the mirror. "I'm so pretty, just like Mommy" Kimmy says while looking at her reflection. She really did look almost like a younger version of Nancy, give or take some of her father's traits.

"Well we should probably find somewhere to get you some new clothes so that you don't have to keep borrowing mine" comments Nancy. She had given Kimmy the white sundress she had packed for this trip. "I didn't exactly bring enough clothes for the two of use to share for long" Nancy adds

Kimmy looks back at her mother and says "but can I keep this one. It's so pretty", twirling around as she looks at her reflection again.

"Fine, but only for this trip" Nancy replies.

Kelly was still upset over her little sister being older than her now. "This is so not fair!" she complains

"Aw, don't cry baby sister, one day you'll grow up into a beautiful young lady" replies Kimmy, patting Kelly on the head.

"Baby sister???" shrieks Kelly

"Cause now that I'm the oldest that makes you my baby sister" Kimmy proclaims. Kelly runs off to her designated bedroom, slamming the door. "What did I do?" asks Kimmy

Kelly turns to Brad "why don't you go play that little game system of your's. Kimmy and I need to have... a private talk between us ladies". Brad simply nods and heads to one of the bedrooms to play his Nintendo Switch. Nancy sets Kimmy down on the couch beside her to talk.

"When do I get to do grown up things Mommy?" Kimmy asks

"First, maybe you should start calling me 'Mom' instead of 'Mommy'. People would think it's weird for an 18 year old to still call her mother 'Mommy'" says Nancy

"ok I guess" Kimmy replies gloomy

"Second, there are some basics I need to go over with you now that you're... an adult..." Nancy says before pausing. "Jesus, I can't believe you're already a grown woman. It was literally only yesterday when you were my little girl"

"There are rules, but I thought grown ups could do whatever they wanted!" whines Kimmy

"Now Kimmy, there are responsibilities that come with being an adult. And there are still laws that adults have to follow too. And you literally leaped straight from childhood to adulthood so there's a lot of maturing you've missed out on. Which is why I am going to help you transition into your adulthood" Nancy explains.

"ok" was all Kimmy replied with

"Kimmy, you're not a child anymore, please be more respectful" Nancy says sternly

"Sorry Mommy - I mean Mom" Kimmy replies. She chuckles, realizing how tricky this "adulting" is. "Ok, I'm ready Mom" Kimmy says more respectfully.

"Good. Now first I'm going to lay out a few rules before I start going over the basics of adulthood. Rule 1, until you've mastered 'adulting' you will need to be under my supervision or ask for my permission before you do anything. Rule 2, it would would be useful for you to do some homeschool when we return home from this trip " Nancy says

"Home school? But I already go to school" Kimmy replies

"Kindergarten is for 5 year olds dear. You are 18 now, you would typically be in your last year of high school or entering college.."

"Do I get to go to college now?!" Kimmy asks, her face lit up

"I'm not sure to be honest sweety. You can't really go to school anymore so entering college might be out of the question. But that doesn't mean you can't find a good job that doesn't require college"

"I have to work!!!" whines Kimmy

"Watch your tone young lady. And that is rule 3, you should start trying to work now that you are an adult. Obviously you will still be living with us - after all I would never abandon my baby out in the lonely world" Nancy says, pinching Kimmy's cheeks. "Sorry sweety, still not used to seeing you so grown up. Anyway those are the three rules. Is that clear?"

Knowing that her mother would not take no for an answer, Kimmy nods and says "Yes ma'am. I am ready for your wisdom". She covers her mouth "I never heard that word before. wisdom. I even know what it means."

Nancy replies "strange, but it could be that if your father experienced mental regression along with his physical regression then maybe your brain has developed too. You probably have a expanded vocabulary now that you're grown up"

"cool" Kimmy says

"Ok, now let's start" says Nancy, who begins explaining to Kimmy everything about adulthood... yes including "the birds and the bees"...

It had taken Nancy several hours to explain to Kimmy all the basics of adulthood. Kimmy felt a little nauseous over some.. certain details. "Gross Mom" Kimmy whines

"Don't worry dear, you'll get used to it quickly" replies Nancy. Nancy then helps Kimmy up from the couch, holding both hands and just looking at the 18 year old image of her daughter - her daughter who had only been a 5 year old mere hours ago but was now becoming a woman. They really do grow up so fast. "So Kimmy, what would you like to do on your first night as an adult?" Nancy asks.

Kimmy has some trouble thinking of something so Nancy decides to help suggest something. They end up deciding on....

121212212.content:
After what had felt like forever to Tim, Nancy lifted her regressed husband of the bathtub, setting him down on a towel she had placed on the bathroom counter, before proceeding to dry him off with another towel. While he was being dried, Tim had noticed that Nancy had set aside what looked like some clothes for him to wear.

"You're going to have to wear Brad's old toddler clothes from now on dear" said Nancy as she proceeded to dress the man-turned-tot.

"What do you mean by 'from now on'?" a startled Tim asked. Surely he wouldn't be like this forever, right?

"Well as far as we and the doctors are concerned, there is no way to reverse this virus, so you might want to get used to the idea of having a second childhood" Nancy explained. "I guess this kind of makes me your surrogate mother now" she added just to teaser her husband. Tim was not so amused.

Once he was all dressed (Nancy had chosen a simple outfit for him; a plain baby blue shirt and brown shorts), Tim raised his arms up towards his wife, expecting to be held in her arms once again, which Nancy seemed to confirm.

"You must be hungry dear, time for some breakfast" Nancy said as she brought Tim downstairs. Tim wasn't really thinking so much about his stomach however; rather he had a much different concern.

"but what about the kids... they'll see me like this" Tim uttered

Nancy responds with...
121212212.title: nothing happens

1212122122.content:
Tim tried his best to ignore the stares coming from his kids, Kelly, Brad and Kimmy, whom had been astonished by the image of their father as a toddler. Unfortunately the only other thing he could focus on was the fact that he was now sitting in Kimmy's spare feeding seat while being spoon fed cereal by his wife. Nancy even made him wear a bib. His focus though was shifted once again when Kimmy, who was sitting right next to him, asked ,"Mommy, does this mean that Daddy will going to kindergarten with me?".

"Daddy's much too young even for kindergarten now sweety" Nancy responded

Kimmy, out of innocent curiosity, asked, "how old is Daddy now?", not realizing that merely bringing light of the situation made her regressed father feel all the more humiliated.

"probably around 4 years old dear" Nancy answered, "he's even a little bit smaller than you now Kimmy".

"can we not talk about this" Tim asked gently, though in his petite form, which was blushing a little, rather than project authority, it ended up making his teenage daughter's eyes lit up, who then began to cue over how cute her Daddy looked.

After everyone was finished with their breakfast, the family gathered in the living room to discuss the situation. Everyone's attention was on Tim, who was being held in Kelly's lap (he was probably going to be held in his wife's lap but Kelly pleaded her mother to let her hold her tot Daddy).

Nancy was the first one to speak on the matter, "so we are going to have to make a quick visit to the doctor so that they can check up on your father and make sure the virus won't regress him further"

"are the doctors going to be able... to change Dad back" Brad asked his mother

Nancy forced a smile before answering that question, "while they can make sure that the virus won't regress your father any further, there is no known way to reverse the virus. So it's very likely that your father will probably just have to grow up all over again". When Nancy said this, everyone's attention was directed towards Tim.

"Does this mean Daddy can't be Daddy anymore" Kimmy asked

"I may be little but I'm still your father you know" Tim retorted

"Oh Daddy, as if you can still be called our father" Kelly pointed out while looking down at her father, "you might as well be our new baby brother now that you're even younger than Kimmy. You're even wearing Brad's old clothes now"

"Tim, while you are still my husband and the father of our children, Kelly does have a point" Nancy said. While Tim did not like where this was going, he had to admit that Nancy was right. Like who would take a 4 year old seriously - especially out in public. Nancy continued, "first we will all head to the hospital to make sure your father isn't going to regress more. After that, we will talk more about the changes that will be happening in the household"

"changes?" Tim asked in an unintentionally cute manner that almost made Kelly squeal.

"don't worry honey, I'm not going to make you call me 'Mommy' or anything like that. But I suggest you should start thinking of me as your 'surrogate mother' rather than as your wife from now on. Same with our children; you'll essentially be treated as though you were their baby brother. Also keep in mind that you'll be treated no differently than any other little boy, with a set bedtime and everything." Nancy explained. As much as he didn't want this, Tim knew this was the only logical decision to make in lite of his regression, simply letting out a soft "ok" to his wife. Nancy then proceeded to tell the family to get in the car. Tim was about to jump off his teenage daughter's lap, however Kelly stopped him, proceeding to carry him in her arms as she got up.

"Come on Kelly, I'm still old enough to walk by myself" Tim protested. His teenage daughter however insisted that since he would have had to be lifted up again to be placed in the spare booster car seat that she might as well save the trouble and carry him the way there. "Besides Daddy, you're so cute!" Kelly added as she strapped and buckled her father-turned-surrogate baby brother into the booster seat. Once Tim was strapped firmly in his seat, Kelly proceeding to claim the booster seat now that she was the only one old enough to ride in front with Nancy. Brad was sitting in the back seat of the car, while Kimmy was strapped in her booster seat in the middle of the car, next to Tim's seat. Kelly had a big smile on her face at the image of her father strapped in a booster seat alongside Kimmy as Nacny began to start the car. Kimmy was expressing joy at being able to sit next to her Daddy.

Tim on the other hand felt almost trapped in the booster seat, as his mobility was extremely limited to his head, arms and legs while his body as a whole was held tight by the straps and buckle. He tried not to think too much about it, since he knew he was going to have to get used to this and since it was a 35 minute drive to the hospital. Instead he just sat idly as the car exited the neighborhood. Once they were on the highway, Tim noticed that he was feeling tired, likely because of the vibration of the moving car soothing his tiny body. It was only 5 minutes later when he finally succumbed to slumber....
1212122122.title: time to meet the rest of the family

12121221222.content:
After several minutes of looking around the hospital parking, Nancy had finally found a good spot to park the car. By the time Nancy had turned off the car, Brad had already been complaining about being cooped up in the back, impatient to get out of the car.

"Kelly, go ahead and unbuckle Kimmy so that Brad can get out the car" Nancy told her oldest daughter. Kelly however complained that she wanted to unbuckle her father.

"Mom, I really wanted to unbuckle Daddy - or should I be calling him Timmy now since.. you know" Kelly protested while bringing the sleeping form of the father-turned-toddler to Nancy's attention.

"Well 1) he is still your father... for the time being 2) Don't you think you had enough fun humiliating your father." Nancy retorted her oldest. She then added with a little grin " and 3) I want to have some fun too". Nancy seemed to have convinced her oldest who proceeded to unbuckle the still awake Kimmy. Grabbing her purse, Nancy got out of the car and opened the car door next to Tim, who was still asleep in his booster seat.

Nancy paused to look at her sleeping husband (or soon-to-be-son in lite of the situation), and she couldn't help but smile at the little boy. Even though he had just had his life turned upside down, being reduced from a loving husband and father of 3 kids to a 4 year old little boy. While she had teased about being Tim's new mother, Nancy understood how hard this must all be for Tim to process and accept. And yet in spite of that, he looked so peaceful in his sleeping form. Nancy began to wonder what the little boy had been dreaming of as she unbuckled him. Whatever he had been dreaming about, Tim was now slowly waking up to his wife unbuckling him from his car seat.

"Wake up Tim, we've arrived at the hospital" Nancy softly said

"What took so long?" Tim yawned

"You fell asleep silly" Nancy told Tim as she lifted him out of the car seat

"Can I please walk on my own now?" Tim said in Nancy's arms while rubbing his eyes

"You still look a little tired sweety, and we are a little bit far from the closest elevator. So how about I carry you until we get to the waiting room dear? And then you can be free to walk all you want... just stay within my view and hold my hand when we walk together. That sound good?" Nancy said to Tim. Tim though knew this was not a request; Nancy was not asking for his permission but rather telling him. And because he was still a little drowsy from the nap, he simply nodded to his wife.



Later in the Hospital

Nancy was able to get an appointment set rather quickly (since it was a rather urgent matter and the hospital was instructed to keep the virus a secret). She then joined the rest of the family in the waiting room. Everyone was sitting, including Tim; he wasn't that much into the idea of playing with the kids' toys present in the waiting room so he was willingly sitting in Kelly's lap once again, her left arm holding him in place while her right hand was twirling his hair.

After about 10 minute they were called in by the doctors, who guided them to the check up room. Keeping with her promise, Nancy held her regressed husband's hand while they walked to the check up room before lifting him up to the check up room's table. Tim's doctor greeted them before coming to Tim. The doctor started with the usual check up on Tim, checking his ears and heart pulse and all that other stuff. Afterwards the doctor said, "Well Tim, it looks like everything about your body is exactly that of a perfectly healthy young little boy such as yourse.." the doctor stopped himself on the last part and apologized

"it's fine" Tim responded

"As for the regression virus, we've been able to observe from the virus more closely with your dna sample from your normal adult body" the doctor told Tim, "we will just need one more sample from your current body so that we can determine if there will be anymore effects from the virus. a blood sample should do"

While any other 4 year old would have panicked, Tim sat calmly as the doctor got a little blood sample from him (it did hurt a but though).

After about 30 minutes of waiting, the doctor returned, with certain papers in his hands.

"So... is the virus going to make him get even younger?" Nancy nervously asked

The doctor replied with...

Kelly, Brad and Kimmy surrounded Nancy, in awe of the 6 month old baby in her arms.

"Wow I can not believe that's actually Dad" Kelly remarked.

While Tim was still fully able to comprehend his oldest daughter's words, his regressed brain had left him incapable of speaking even if he tried, so he responded the only way he could think of at the moment - whining pathetically in the arms of his wife.

"Shh.. shhh... it's ok honey" Nancy said softly, lightly bouncing and consoling the baby Tim. Unfortunately the baby started to cry a little harder, knowing full well that this was going to be his life from now on. He would have to grow up all over again and there was nothing he could do about it; he was completely helpless.

....

"Who'd ever thought that Dad would be such a crybaby" Brad complained, having been stuck in the car with the baby Tim, now strapped in a baby's booster seat, whaling next to him though out the whole car ride.

"Well it's not like there's much else he's able to do" Kelly pointed out from the shotgun

"But still.." Brad remarked, "even Kimmy is annoyed", point at the 5 year old on the other side of the car covering her ears.

Nancy, keeping her eyes on the road while driving, responded "Well this is a very stressful time for your father, dear."

After a few more minutes, the family had finally arrived at their destination, parking in the lot of the Babys 'R Us store.

"Kelly, could you hold your father" Nancy said as she passed Tim to Kelly's arms. Tim, realizing that they were in a public store, decided to stop crying, not wanting to humiliate himself any further. However even that only lasted around 30 minutes of shopping when he realized something else - related to his stomach.

"Mom, do you think Dad might be hungry?" Kelly asked, noticing that it was now close to noon.

Nancy stepped closer to Kelly, looking down towards Tim. "Are you hungry dear?" she asked, figuring that Tim could still understand them. The baby nodded.

With that Nancy gently took the baby from Kelly's arms and feed the baby how - ?

12121221222111.content:
From Nancy's arms, the baby Tim became curious as to where she was going exactly. He assumed that Nancy would just have a bottle of milk or something ready, as much as he was not amused by the prospect of drinking from such. As far as he was concerned it was at least better than ... the alternative.

However things started to get a little suspicious for Tim, namely when he noticed his wife stop to ask of one the baby store's employees a question - rather whisper it. Tim wondered to himself on why Nancy would have to whisper - and what it was she was asking. Then he noticed that his wife was headed to the restroom area .... and he saw something that got him nervous.

"Mother's changing room" read the sign on the door Nancy proceeded to open, making sure to lock the two of them in the room she had brought them to. Tim became confused as Nancy set him down on the changing platform. Since he did not need to be changed, he realized that could only mean....

And one look at Nancy - who was unbuttoning her shirt - was all that was needed to confirm the baby's fears.

Before Tim could scream, Nancy picked Tim up, trying to get the baby to calm down the best she could.

"I know this isn't what you would have in mind, especially right now" Nancy explained, "but we didn't have any formula or baby bottles around at the house."

Tim started pouting, putting on a grumpy face, though this did not deter his wife.

"Look I'm sorry, but if you are hungry then this is the only way I am able to feed you right now" Nancy remarked, bringing the baby closer to her exposed breast.

Does Tim try to resist the best he can?
12121221222111.title: Nancy goes to a private restroom to breast feed...

choices: They return home without any difficulties along the way
121212212221111.content:
Knowing how stubborn Nancy could be, the baby Tim gathered up all the willpower he could muster - and started sucking on the exposed nipple....
...
...
"Well this is really weird" would be an understatement in regards to what was going through Tim's head as he drank from his wife's breast. He could not believe that he was really doing it, bringing himself this low, but here he was. He couldn't help but feel ashamed - even though he was now a baby, Tim still thought of himself as being a grown man first, thus the idea of him sucking on his wife's nipple was rather disturbing to him. And even as a baby, this was rather disturbing to him. What he found more disturbing however was how as he went on, he started to not really think about anything - like he was going through the motion with no other thoughts other than getting fed. It was even started to getting rather.... comforting.

comforting???....

Tim tried to fight it, seeing if he could pull away, but Nancy, knowing that 1 minute was not long enough to feed the baby, kept him in place. He started to wonder how Nancy might have been feeling about.. this. Was she by any chance weirded out by this situation too? Did she have to tell herself to do this? Such thoughts though eventually dissipated as once again he started to zone out - and go with the flow...

After what felt like a few more minutes, Nancy pulled Tim away from her chest. Back to his senses, the baby Tim had a completely blank look on his face. He was also feeling full.

"Well.... all done.. I guess" Nancy shyly said to the baby before setting him down on the changing platform - only this time positioning him so that he would be looking away as she buttoned up her shirt. Tim just stared at the wall trying to make sense of what the hell had just happened the last few minutes.

"please don't tell me I will have to be doing this again" was all Tim could think.

Before long, Nancy picked the baby back up, and exited the changing room to meet up with the rest of the family, who were now waiting in the checkout line.

What happens next?
121212212221111.title: No - hesitantly starts sucking

1212122122211112.content:
On the way home, Tim sat idly in the baby seat. In front of him was Kimmy making goofy faces, the 5 year old wanting to see if she could make her babified father laugh. But Tim was ignoring her. Instead he was wondering several things.

He was wondering how he was going to adjust to this change. Being a baby, he couldn't really act as a father figure for his kids or as a husband for Nancy; he might as well be the baby of the family. And he didn't know if he could bear another breast feeding another time soon.

He was also wondering whether he would be able to remember everything about his old life, or if his regressed brain will slowly make him forget everything. And if the latter, would that make him a baby in body AND mind?

He was also wondering whether or not the virus was truly gone now.

Regardless, eventually he grew tired of Kimmy making faces in front of him. So he decided to fake a laugh to make the little girl happy.

"LOOK MOMMY, I MADE DADDY LAUGH!" Kimmy proudly exclaimed.

...

The rest of the day went by quick for the baby Tim. Once it was time for bed, Nancy set the baby Tim in what was now his crib, telling him "Good night" and softly kissing his forehead before leaving. Tim wanted to stay up but eventually he submitted to tye wants of his baby body and fell asleep.

Does anything to tim later?
1212122122211112.title: They return home without any difficulties along...

choices: the Virus was contagious - infects another family member
12121221222111121.content: So does life just go on as normal but with Tim stuck as a baby? Or was the virus by any chance contagious?
12121221222111121.title: No

121212212221111211.content:
Turned out that the virus was not contagious whatsoever, so nothing out of the ordinary happened to the family - other than the father, Tim, stuck as a baby.

Tim was struggling to adapt to his new life as the baby of the family. For one, sitting in one's own "little messes" was not all that amusing for the former man. Then there was having to be taken care of by his own children, who were beginning to treat him more as a baby sibling than a father figure. Not to mention his "meals" just boiled down to baby milk (every day he dreaded having to do that ever again) - or making a mess of himself with whatever baby food. He missed being an independent adult and responsible father figure.

After several weeks as a baby however, Tim began to realize just how much easier his life had become. Yes he did lose the independence of adulthood, but now he could spend his days just sitting around, maybe crawl to some places, and play with the baby toys Nancy bought for him. He no longer needed to worry about providing for his family, especially since they were given a a life-worth of savings by the government to cover for the damage caused by the virus. He didn't even have to worry about what was going to be for dinner anymore, now that everything was provided for him. And while he could never love Nancy as a spouse ever again, he had to admit that Nancy was making for a good mother; he loved listening to her lovely voice sing him lullabies.

It wasn't like he was mentally regressing or anything, he still had the mind of an adult. It's just that the former man decided that life was much easier as a baby.

He could just grow up all over again anyway.
121212212221111211.title: Life goes on

121212212221111212.content: Which member of the family gets the virus from being around Tim?
121212212221111212.title: the Virus was contagious - infects another fami...

1212122122211112122.content:
Being carries away with how cute her father has become as a baby, Kelly has tried to pester Tim as much as possible, smothering, changing the diapers and all that. Perhaps she gets infected with the virus?

Or is it one of her younger siblings who end up getting the virus?
1212122122211112122.title: one of the kids

12121221222111121222.content:
Brad, bewildered by the fact that his father was now a baby, has spent a good amount of time looking after the baby Tim, still not able to believe that the baby was his father.

Kimmy also spends a lot of time trying to play with Tim - or pester him with goofy faces.

Which sibling gets infected with the virus?
12121221222111121222.title: Brad or Kimmy become infected

121212212221111212221.content:
Several weeks had passed since the man of the house, Tim, had been reduced to a 4 year old and then to a 6 month old baby. By then everyone had adapted to the new routine and the fact that Tim was now stuck as a baby.

Nancy was in the middle of preparing a bottle of baby formula when she heard a loud scream from upstairs. The concerned mother looked around the kitchen area, where she saw Kelly and Kimmy having their breakfast and Tim sitting idly in the baby feeding seat. There was however no sign of Brad

"Kelly, could you go ahead and feed Tim for me" Nancy said, passing the baby bottle over to an way-too eager Kelly. As Kelly proceeded to feed her babified father, Nancy went up the stairs to see what was going on.

As she neared the door to Brad's room, she heard another scream - coming from the boy's room.

"WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED TO ME!!!"

Nancy quickly opened the door. "Brad, what's wrong de- " she couldn't finish her sentence, shocked at the image before her.

"oh my.." was all Nancy could say as she saw that her son Brad had become -
121212212221111212221.title: Brad

choices: Nancy takes Brad out on several errands to help her adjust to girlhood
1212122122211112122212.content:
"WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED TO ME!!!!!!" screamed the young girl in front of Nancy. Immediately the young girl covered her mouth with her hands. As confused as Nancy was at the situation, she was for certain that this young girl was in fact her son, Brad. For one she basically looked like a female version of Brad, albeit with longer hair, especially when wearing those Buzz Lightyear pajamas. Also mother's instincts.

"Sweety,... come here" Nancy told the new girl who was starting to tear up. Not knowing what else to do, Brad darted towards Nancy, burying her face in her mother's midwasit, her hands clinging onto her mother's sweater and crying violently. Nancy gently wrapped her arms around the crying girl, doing the best she could to comfort her "daughter".

"Mom, what's goin- "

Curious as to the source of the voice, Brad looked from her mother's embrace, spotting Kelly standing there, holding Tim in her arms.

"No fucking way" Kelly said out aloud much to Brad's annoyance. It was made worse when baby Tim started laughing. Immediately Brad buried herself back in her mother's embrace.

....

Nancy drove the female Brad up to the doctor, having placed Kelly in charge of watching over Tim and Kimmy. The receptionist, recognizing Nancy, asked who the "little girl was", when Nancy whispered to the receptionist, the receptionist stood still for a few seconds before calling their doctor from before.

Brad sat down next to her mother in the waiting room, nervous about being out in public.... like this. Her mother made her wear some of Kelly's old clothes, so she was stuck in a mini-skirt for the time being. She was still allowed to wear her favorite light jacket though, at least some semblance of her former "boyhood" left. Though even then she still felt out of place in this girlier clothes. And it didn't help that she noticed some boy across the waiting room trying to tease her with a bunch of mean faces. Despite trying to ignore the rude boy, the waiting room bully persisted. "I hope my friends aren't the same way...." Brad thought to herself, afraid that her friends from school would want to stop being friends with her now that she was no longer a boy. The boys and girls in his class never really got along with each other very much.

Soon a nurse called their names, directing them out of the waiting room. Seeing that they would be passing the rude boy, Brad decided to take the opportunity to stick her tongue out at the boy. However a few seconds later Brad processed at what he had just done. "Oh my gosh, I'm already acting like a girl" she thought to herself while following her mother and the nurse to the doctor's room.

After some tests, and a quick blood sample, the doctor came to the confusion that Brad's sudden gender change was the result of one cause.

"but I thought the virus only regresses physical age" a confused Nancy asked the doctor

"I know this, this is a bit of a shock to us too, but considering that we have been seeing other occurrences of similar cases in some subjects, it may be possible that the virus has been able to evolve and become even more unpredictable in how it changes the body and dna. So gender change is no longer out of the question" the doctor said.

"and I take it that this change is... permanent?" asked Nancy

"for the time being, yes?"

"BUT I DON'T TO BE A GIRL!" whined Brad.

"Well look at it this way, from the looks of your blood samples it doesn't seem like the virus is strong enough anymore to cause anymore transformations to your body - likely"

Brad started to tear up again. "What am I going to do". Nancy knelt down to Brad, wrapping her arms around the crying girl

"We'll figure this out sweety" Nancy assured her "daughter", "It's fortunate that only your gender changed though; we won't have to have you switch grades with Kimmy or anyone" this was Nancy's attempt to lighten up the situation

"But will friends will hate me now" Brad whined

"Oh they won't hate you, sweety" Nancy assured

"and what if they do?"

"Well even if they do leave you over your gender, that just means that they didn't deserve your friendship anyway"

"not helping mom" brad whined

"We will figure this out sweety. Just put your trust in me, ok? I've lived though girlhood, so I can help you adjust to your new gender. Sound like a plan?"

For once upon hearing her mother's words, Brad looked up and nodded.


Once they were back at the car, Nancy let Brad sit in the shotgun seat to try to cheer her up.
"I don't have to go to school.. .like this yet, do I" Brad asked her mother
"Well..." Nancy muses before answering
1212122122211112122212.title: a girl (gender change)

choices: Bradley's friends try to comfort her (Acceptance)
Bradley's "friends" start to tease and make fun of her (Rejection)
12121221222111121222121.content:
The girlified Bradley stood sheepishly in front of the classroom. The new girl tries to look away, not wanting to see all of the stares coming from her classmates, hoping to forget how the entire class, including her friends, were seeing her like this. It didn't help that her Mom made her wear some of Kelly's old clothes, and it especially did not help that it felt really really weird walking around in the skirt. "How can anyone walk in this?" Bradley thinks to herself.

Seeing that Bradley was not willing to present herself to the class, the teacher proceed with the news. "I'm sure some of you have heard about some people getting sick and transforming. Well... Bradley here, he got sick recently. Well actually he is now a she..." Once the teacher was done, Bradley walking towards her desk as quietly as possible. Even as she sat in her seat, everyone was just staring at her. She couldn't concentrate on what the teacher was writing on the board because it always felt as though someone was just staring at her, that all anyone could focus on was her. The last thing she needed right now was to be the center of attention. She couldn't deal with all this pressure. She couldn't take it anymore. She wanted to cry out loud.

Without so much of a "excuse me Mrs Ellie" or without even raising her hand for a hall pass, Bradley darted out the classroom for the nearest restroom she could find. Finding a restroom, she wasted no time to lock herself in one of the stalls. She then wasted no time folding her arms, burying her head into them as she wailed out tears. Locking herself in the restroom, she also remembered that something was missing between her legs. She started to cry even harder. This was all too much for her to take in all at once. She never asked to be a girl, she was perfectly happy withing being a boy. And she also never asked to have a baby as a father either. It was all because of that damned virus that her life has been turning upside down.

She knew not how much time had passed by the time her tears stopped, all she knew was that she was too worn out to cry another tear right now. Unlocking the stall door, she steadily walked out - and froze at the sight of her friends.

"Oh shit" Bradley cursed in her head. She realized that there were several urinals right beside her. She had entered the boys room.

"Brad? Why are you in the boys room?" Daniel, one of her friends in sight, said

"I.. didn't mean to... just leave me alone ok" Bradley trying to walk past her friends, Daniel, Chris, and Jake. Before she could leave the boys room however -
12121221222111121222121.title: Female Brad goes to school

choices: skip to the night of the sleepover
121212212221111212221211.content:
Bradley felt a hand on her shoulder. She looked back, looking face to face with Chris.

"You don't seem to be doing ok" Chris remarked Both Jake and Daniel seemed to agree with Chris.

Bradley shook her head sideways. "I know this may sound a little weird... but I could really use a hug right now guys" To her surprise Bradley was embraced in a group hug with her friends. Bradley was left speechless, knowing not what else to do other than to hug all her friends back.
After what felt like a few minutes, they slowly break away. "Wait, you mean you guys don't hate me now?" Bradley says

"Of course not, why would we?" Jake was the first to reply

"We're friends, aren't we?" Chris remarked

"It's just that I thought that y'all wouldn't like me anymore now that I was a girl"

"But it's still you in, right dude?" Daniel comments, bumping his elbow against Bradley's

Bradley nodded

"Then things are just as they have always been dude" Daniel adds

"and besides, to be honest, it's actually kind of cool having a girl in the group" Jake comments

"Really?" Bradley asks. All her friends nod. Soon Bradley finds that she does have another tear left in her after all, just not a sad one. "Thank you!", without thinking Bradley pulls all her friends into another group hug, they hug her back.

The restroom door opens.

"Boys, you do realize that there are no girls allowed in the boys room, right" Everyone looks back to see the school janitor. "Oh, sorry miss. I didn't realize that it was you" it appeared that even the janitor had heard about Bradley's transformation into a girl, "well remember to not do it again, ok miss?" before exiting the restroom.

"I guess I gotta go" Bradley says, "also maybe you should be calling me dudette"

"Alright, Anyway, are you still coming over to the sleepover this weekend?" Chris asks

"You bet!" Bradley says aloud, surely her Mom would still let her hang out with the guys even though she was now a different gender from them. Bradley was however sure that she was feeling a little better now, even if she still wasn't entirely comfortable with this new body yet.
121212212221111212221211.title: Bradley's friends try to comfort her (Accep...

12121221222112.content:
Luckily Nancy had prepared a bottle of formula just in case. With the bottle in her hand, Nancy feeds her former husband, who knew very well that there was no other choice of breakfast for him available.

"Keep eating little one" Nancy says to her new baby, making sure her little Timmy drank every last drop. Her little Timmy. Already she accepted her former husband as her new child and baby; it was going to be very interesting watching him grow up.

Kelly was growing impatient. "Can't I feed him, Mom?" She remarks. "Ok, fine. Here you go" Nancy replies, placing Timmy back in her daughter's arms, "but make sure he eats it all". "Yes Mom" replies Kelly, whose eyes were focused on her former Dad rather than on her Mom. She thought her former father made for the cutest little bundle ever. She kind of prefered him this way.

Kelly hands her mother the empty baby bottle so that she could beging playing with little Timmy. "Tickle, tickle, tickle" Kelly cues while trying to tickle the baby.

Timmy tries to resist. "Please stop. Cause cause I look like a baby doesn't mean you have to treat me like one" he thinks, unable to speak said words. Unfortunately he finds the tickling too hard to resist. Before long he can only longer hold in the baby chuckles, which only make him even cuter in his "big sister's" eyes.

"You are a cute little baby. Yes you are. Yes you are" Kelly remarks playfully, continuing to tickle her baby brother.

After the store Nancy drops the kids off at home. "Since your father can't work anymore, I am going to have to work longer shifts. So I need you to babysit from now on Kelly" Nancy says. "You got it Mom, aint no problem" replies Kelly. As the car leaves the driveway, Kelly motions Timmy's little arm to wave "bye" before coming back inside.

With her baby brother still in her arms, Kelly decides to -
12121221222112.title: Nancy has a bottle of milk ready to feed Tim with

choices: Tim stays at daycare while family runs errands
Shopping for Tim or take Tim to playground
121212212222.content:
The doctor responded, trying to be positive about the situation, "Well the good news is that the activity of the virus in Tim's regressed body compared to his adult body has decreased immensely to the point that the cells should be working properly again; he won't be getting any younger".

Nancy, along with the rest of the family, were relieved to hear this. There was one more concern however. "and the bad news?" Nancy asked

The doctor took a sec to clean his glasses before answering her question, "Well for one, we don't have any known means to reverse the damage done by the virus." That sentence alone was enough to seal Tim's fate, but there was still more. The doctor continued "and while the body is functioning normally again, since the virus is still in him there is a slight chance that there will also be some mental regression as well. We aren't too sure about that detail, but just be prepared for if this young boy starts acting more like a young boy anytime soon".

As scary as the last part was to Tim, all he was thinking about was that he can no longer his kids' father and he would have to relive childhood in the care of his wife.

"I'll leave you all some time alone to discuss this matter while I get you the required documents" the doctor said, closing the door behind him as he exited the room.

"So I guess we won't be calling you Dad anymore" Brad stated

"Doesn't look that way" Tim replied as Kelly brought him down to the floor. Kimmy, was a good few inches taller than him now, went up to Tim.

"I promise to be like a good big sister for you" Kimmy said. Tim was still not amused that his own kids were treating him like he was their baby brother.

Nancy knelt down to Tim, telling him that everything was going to be alright. It was however not alright to Tim who began to tear up.

"Oh great... now I'm crying like a baby" Tim cried. Seeing her husband succumb to his regressed body's sensations, Nancy pulled Tim in for a hug, holding him tightly and giving him emotional support as he buried his face in under her head. The rest of the family joined in on the hug.

Later....

Afterwards the doctor had Tim sign some documents the best he could, said documents essentially serving the purpose forfeiting his adult life, marriage and job included, all the while agreeing to be legally recognized as a minor. After he had signed the documents, Nancy was given some documents to sign as well which included completing the "divorce" and becoming Tim's new legal guardian. Once all the papers were signed, the doctor told the family to expect the documents to be sent to the government and filed in within a week.

In the meantime, now that Tim was no longer her husband, instead now her "newly adopted son", Nancy contemplated on what to do next as she buckled her former husband in his booster seat. Tim didn't fall asleep on the car ride home, instead just staring at the faint reflection of his regressed toddler body in the window.

Once they were home, the family began to have the leftover steak and mac&cheese for lunch at the table. Tim, sitting in what was now his feeding seat, was obviously given a smaller plate than before - with the meat cut up in little bite size pieces as knifes were too dangerous for toddlers - and a little sippy cut of water. Lunch was rather slow as the kids spent more time watching their former father struggle to use his small fork pick up the meat to eat than they did eating. It was especially intriguing for the kids to watch their former father turned little brother make a mess of himself as he tried to eat the mac&cheese, getting it all over the seat and himself. When lunch was finally over, Nancy cleaned Tim and the seat with wipes.

And it just about the same story at dinner time...

After which Tim was directed towards Brad's room for bedtime. Brad didn't mind sleeping on a sleeping bag on the floor for one night, while Tim slept on the bed. While it took no time for Brad to fall asleep, Tim struggled to fall asleep at first, still trying to process what had happened this day. Though eventually he dozed off....

What are the plans for tomorrow?
121212212222.title: no

1212122122221.content:
Tim stood silently in the middle of the daycare, uninterested or rather unwilling to play with the other children "his age". Unfortunately for him, one of the caretakers at the daycare came over to persuade him to go play with the other children.

"Tim, remember that your mother said to try interact with other kids" the caretaker softly but firmly instructed him, "your mother" referring to Nancy which Tim was still not used to, nor was he sure that he ever wanted to get used to.
Not wanting to be bothered further by the caretaker, Tim forced himself to a spot where several kids were at. After he sat down, he took note of what the kids around him were playing with: building blocks, figures, duplo, or whatever it was kids played with these days. Of course, none of these interested the former grown man, regardless however he forced himself to grab some building blocks to build a tower or something. While randomly stacking the blocks, Tim recalled the events of the morning that led up to this moment.

Flashback...

Tim sat idle in the booster seat as Nancy dropped Brad and Kimmy off at school - Nancy walked Kimmy to the class to make sure she was safe, so Tim was under the watchful eye of Kelly, who was still teasing him about "how cute he was", during the duration of that time. Once Nancy returned, they were headed off to drop Kelly off at high school. After she got her things, before heading to the school, Kelly made sure to say goodbye to Tim - by giving him a little kiss on the forehead while telling him "Have fun little buddy", the "little buddy" part especially making Tim want to scold Kelly for patronizing him. However now that he was no longer an authority figure in Kelly's life, there was not much he could do about it.

With the kids at school, Tim had expected his former wife, now surrogate mother, to drive him back home. however after several minutes more of riding in the car, Tim realized that they were not going the way back home.

"Uhh. .. Nan.... I mean..... mmMommy..." Tim asked while struggling to refer to his former wife as mother, even more with addressing her as "mommy" specifically, "where exactly are we going?"

"Well we can't have you sleeping in Brad's bed forever dear, so I'm going to run a few errands to get you some new things for this new life of yours" Nancy answered. "However", she continued, "I'm going to be dropping you off at a daycare first". It took Tim a few seconds to process that last part Nancy said.

"But why........" Tim complained

"Because I think you need to get used to being around other kids your 'age' dear" Nancy answered

"But I really don't want to be out in public... like this" Tim pouted in an admittedly childish manner fitting for an actual 4 year old

"There's nothing I can do about that dear. As far as everyone else, including the government, is concerned you're a 4 year old little boy. And with no way to change you back, you're going to stay like that until you grow up along with every other child. Therefore you need to get used to being with other children your 'age' dear" Nancy retorted. "Also, daycare might help you accept your new life" she added.

Tim didn't bother to continue arguing with Nancy, instead just sitting back in the booster seat until they had arrived at the daycare. Once Tim was unbuckled and lifted out of the car seat, he and Nancy walked towards the daycare, with Nancy holding his hand along the way.

As they met the instructors of the daycare, Nancy had a little talk with one of the caretakers while Tim waited by her. After a little talk from Nancy urging him to play with the other children and maybe try to make some friends, Tim was left at the daycare while Nancy headed off to run errands.

Back to present...

Tim continued to "play" with the building blocks, being as uncreative about it as possible, putting in the minimum effort needed to satisfy the caretakers. Just stack, knock over, repeat. He kept cycling through this pattern until he heard another voice - talking to him. "Can I play with you" was what Tim heard, realizing that one of the other children had gone up to him. He turned his head to look at the child who wanted to play with him, seeing that the child was a
1212122122221.title: Tim stays at daycare while family runs errands

choices: to the mall to get something for lunch.
12121221222212.content:
Tim looked up and saw a little boy who couldn't be any older than 6 holding onto what looked like a Transformer figure. Tim tried to see if he could ignore the boy some more. It didn't work however.

"It's ok if you don't have one" the little boy said, clearly in reference to his transformer figure, "we can just play with the blocks if you want". Tim looked at the boy in front of him again. Even though he was sitting, Tim could tell that this boy was probably bigger than him by a few inches in height. The former man found it rather surreal and uncomfortable how technically this 6 year old boy was now technically his "elder", along with probably a good amount of the children in this daycare. Another thing he was going to have to get used to whether he liked it or not.

Tim was going to try to ignore the boy again, but unfortunately for him the caretaker from earlier came by.

"Why don't you go play with Matthew, Tim" the caretaker said to Tim; so the little boy had a name. Knowing that the caretaker wasn't going to leave him alone if he refused, Tim hesitantly invited Matthew to play with him.

"I'll help you build a tower if you like" Matthew kindly said. Again, Tim hesitantly played along, even tho he didn't have any real interest in the blocks. Though he admittedly soon found that playing with the blocks was a little bit more enjoyable. Soon they had a decent sized tower, and Tim got an idea when he remembered the transformer toy Matthew had.

"Ummm.. you know, giant robots like to destroy buildings" Tim said to Matthew.

"But what about you?" Matthew replied.

"Uhhh.." Tim uttered, looking around himself for anything. Eyeing an extra block, he said, "I'll just pretend that this is a giant robot", grabbing onto the extra block

Matthew smiled. "Ok" he said. In no time soon, the two were smashing the block tower down with their "giant robots", making sure to leave as much impact as possible (or what they could imagine at least). With the tower gone, Matthew got an idea of his own. "Wanna fight me" he suggested. Tim nodded as he proceeded to bump the block in his hand against the transformer (though making sure not to be to break the transformer toy). So for the next several minutes the two fought with their "giant robots". However, soon it was clear that the block was no match for the transformer.

"I won" Matthew exclaimed.

"Oh.. well..." Tim stuttered, for he realized that for some reason he was feeling something foreign yet recognizable to him.

"Are you ok?" Matthew asked as Tim started to tear up a little.

"No fair" Tim whined, "My robot died". Tim had no idea why he, a grown man (in a toddler's body granted) was crying over having lost in a make believe giant robot fight. But all he knew was that he was an upset little boy sad that he lost. However before he could really start crying, he saw Matthew come in closer.

"I wasn't trying to hurt your feelings" Matthew said to try to comfort the crying Tim.

"But... my.. robot iz... dead.." Tim whined

"It's ok, little buddy. We can fix your robot" Matthew replied

"How?" Tim retorted

"Like this". Before Tim could say anything else, Matthew picked up the block and started doing something with his hand around the block, almost as though he was trying to mime a mechanic with a wrench. "See, all better" Matthew said as he handed the block back to Tim's hands. Now Tim, still a grown man on the inside, knew that this was just a block and Matthew's little hand gestures did not change the block in any way. At the same time however, Tim couldn't help but get cheerful, in a rather childish, gleeful way.

"Yay, my robot is alive" Tim exclaimed, happy that his "giant robot" was "fixed".

"i'm 6 years old myself, almost done with kindergarten and entering 1st grade next" Matthew explained to Tim.

"Actually, I think I turn 5 in the summer" Tim said, remembering that his birthday was always during summer time and that he would probably be going to school afterwards. Something else popped into Tim's mind, "What school do you go to?"

"Anderson Hill Elementary" Matthew answered. So he goes to the same school that Brad and Kimmy attend.

"Funny, I have two older siblings who go to that school" Tim replies. All of a sudden, Matthew lit up.

"Well that probably means you will be going to the same school as me" Matthew said, "and if I recall kindergarten and 1st grade have the same recess period".

"that's cool" Tim said

"so that means we can still play together later on" Matthew said, "in fact you could even come up to me for if you need any help with kindergarten, since I would have the proper experience". For some reason, Tim really liked the idea.

"Would you defend me if anyone is being mean to me" Tim threw out, at which Matthew nodded.

"Maybe think of me as a big brother type figure - only a friend instead of another family member" Matthew offered

At once Tim nodded. And all of a sudden, for some reason he couldn't explain, he got up and hugged Matthew.

"Owie, you're squeezing me little buddy" Matthew playfully said, hugging you back.

It was at the moment that Nancy had come back. "Made a friend already Tim?"

Tim nodded while blushing, for he was sort of embarrassed that Nancy saw him like that.

After exchanging farewells with Matthew, Tim followed Nancy back to the car where he was hoisted up back into his booster seat. While he could not get a good look, he could tell that the back of the car was now filled with all sorts of things Nancy bought for him.

"He's a little old you know" Nancy said

"Only by one year" Tim whined, "and how do you even know how old he is?"

"One, he's more like a year and a half old" Nancy teased, "two, I happen to be friends with his mom, Rebecca. Don'y you remember honey?". Tim might have recalled something about Nancy having a friend named Rebecca, but he admittedly never really payed attention to his former wife's conversations. "point is" Nancy said, leaning closer to Tim as she finished buckling him up. "Close enough I guess" She finished her point as she gently kissed Tim's forehead.

Once Nancy started the car, Tim decided to ask, "Where are we going?"

"Where are you going who exactly" Nancy responded. Tim knew exactly what she was doing.

"I mean.. where are we going now... mommy" Tim shyly said.

"That's mommy's good boy" Nancy chuckled, "anyway, right now we are heading ..."

When they finally arrived back home, Tim readied himself as Nancy unbuckled him from the booster seat. "Ok, 3... 2... 1..." Nancy counted down before lifting Tim out of the booster seat. "Blast Off!" She said in a playful tone.

Tim didn't seem all that amused.

"ah, Mommy thought you'd like that" Nancy remarks. Tim was rather annoyed by how much Nancy seemed to be treating him as though he had always been a little boy rather than her husband before. He was especially still a little bothered by how Nancy seemed to be enforcing this "Mommy" thing onto him, as though she wasn't even thinking about how he had been her husband before all this had happened. This was made all the more obvious when she pinched his cheeks as she carried him into the house.

For lunch Nancy made Tim a simple PJ sandwich meal, however she made it with a "special toddler's sized" bread she got from her errands, along with some "pee-wee" carrots. As Tim tried to eat the lunch the best he could, he kept making some kind of mess with the PJ no matter how hard he tried. Tim grumbles a bit about how uncoordinated his motor skills had become in this body as Nancy cleans him up.

"Ok, sweety, it's time for a nap"

"But it's only 12" Tim retorts

"Exactly. All little boys like you need an afternoon nap so that they can grow up big" Nancy says as she lifts Tim into her arms, carrying him towards Brad's room. "I'll have Kelly help me put together your bed when she returns from school, but in the meantime you will nap in Brad's bed" She tells Tim as she tucks him into bed.

"I'm not tired" Tim insists, "I'm not really 4, I'm a grown man!"

"You were a grown man dear. But now as far as anyone else is concerned you're a 4 year old little boy who needs his nap" Nancy replies. Tim knew better than to argue with his wife turned surrogate mother, knowing that he would probably be punished for disobeying her, so he just plays along as Nancy finishes tucking him into the bed. "Rest, little one" Nancy speaks softly, placing a gentle kiss on Tim's forehead before turning off the lights and leaving the room, the door closed behind her.

Now Tim didn't expect that he would actually fall into slumber, but soon he found that his regressed body's instincts were telling him otherwise. Tim tried to resist his body's instincts, telling himself that he was a grown man, not a little boy. However no matter how much he fought in his head, his body's instincts only fought back harder as he started to get drowsy. Even he knew it, Tim was dozing off into sleep in Brad's bed, taking his from then on scheduled afternoon nap.

1212122122222.content:
"GOOD MORNING LITTLE BUDDY!!!"

Kelly's loud ecstatic voice awoke the then sleeping Tim, who to his disappointment was still a little boy. He was hoping that the events from the past few days were nothing more than a nightmare, that he would wake up in his own bed, still a grown man who was a loving husband and father of 3. Instead he woke up in the bed of his 8 year old son, and reduced to being his children's new baby brother now that he was a mere 4 year old. The reality of the situation creeping in, the man turned little boy decided to do what any little boy would do, hide under the covers while ignoring his now "big sister".

Within seconds however, Kelly removed the covers, exposing Tim. "Come on little buddy, everybody else is already up and ready"

"Please stop calling me little buddy" whined Tim

"But you are my little buddy" Kelly pointed out. As if she hadn't already gotten her point across, she lifted her former father out of the bed, carrying him towards the bathroom. "Whether you like it or not, I'm you big sister now, little buddy. And besides, Mom told me to wake you up and give you a nice bath"

"as in you begged her to let you patronize me so" Tim complained, though the teenage girl paid no attention to her former father's comment as she turned on the water to fill the bath. It was almost a struggle for the teenage girl to undress her father turned "baby brother" out of his pajamas, the latter resisting the best he could. But alas, the teenage girl finally undressed her father, placing him into the bathtub filled with water.

While Kelly was very enthused about cleaning her little father, the latter was constantly whining about having to be bathed by his own daughter. "No father should have to be bathed by his own daughter!"

"Well for someone whose supposed to be my Dad, you sure are acting like a misbehaving child" Kelly pointed out. "Come to think of it, I think I was better behaved at your age than you are right now"

"First off, I'm not 4, I just..... look like it" Tim awkwardly responded. That did not come out as well as he would of liked. Regardless he continued, "second, girls mature faster so it's not fair to make comparisons"

"You do realize that implies that even when ignoring you current state that you're basically less mature than your own daughter" Kelly pointed out. Just as Tim was about to respond he stopped himself, realizing that what his daughter said was indeed correct. Defeated, Tim stared down at the water as his daughter scrubbed his hair.

"Why did this have to happen to me..." uttered Tim, the sadness expressed in the words catching Kelly's attention.

Not wanting to see her father so down, Kelly decided to try to cheer him. "it's going to be ok little buddy"

"stop calling me little buddy"

"but you are my little buddy"

"but I'm supposed to be your father... And..."

"and what?" Kelly asked curiously

"Now I can't see you become the woman I raised you to become"

"you're still here last time I checked" Kelly responded

"Not like that. I mean as a father" Tim admitted "they day you were born was one of the happiest days of my life, and for 14 years I have been eager to help you become a strong grown woman. But no I won't be able see you go off into adulthood as your father. I won't be able to know what it's like to get nervous about you having a boyfriend, or to help you get to a good college, and I especially won't be able to walk you down the isle... on your wedding day..." Tim actually began to tear up as he spoke this. These weren't little kid tears though, they were the tears of a father who might as well have lost everything. However the tears began to stop once Tim felt a warm hand wipe them away.

"You don't have to cry" Kelly said to her father

"but.."

"I know, I know. But I want you to know that you were a great father for me, and I wouldn't be the person I am today if it weren't for you." Kelly continued, "so let me repay the favor by being a good .... big sister for you"

"that doesn't help much" Tim uttered

"but even then, in my heart, you will always be my Dad who stuck by me for all my 14 years of life thus far." Kelly responded. That last comment helped Tim feel a little better.

"I'm still not used to this" Tim thought to himself, though he was a little less bothered by being clean, dried, then dressed by his daughter. Once he was all dressed up, Tim followed Kelly towards the kitchen, where Nancy hoisted him up into his table seat as the family was having pancakes for breakfast. "At least I won't have to be spoon fed today" Tim thought to himself as he struggled to eat the bit sized cut peaces of pancake.

Nancy then told Tim that she was going to be running some errands to get him the necessities (new clothes, a bed, etc) for his new life.

"Do I have to go with you?" Tim asked his former wife, now "mother".

What was Nancy's answer:

1) Take Tim along with her for shopping while the children either tag along or stay at home

2) Nancy goes to the store alone since Brad's old clothes fit Tim quite well so she already has an idea of what size to get Tim. So instead, Kelly will watch over him and the other kids while Nancy goes shopping, in which Kelly decides to take her siblings, including Tim, to the neighborhood playground
