Feeling humiliated in front of his teenage daughter, the regressed Tim ran out the bathroom door as soon as Kelly placed him down on the floor. He was so focused on getting away from Kelly that he paid no attention where he was running towards until he suddenly bumped into someone, falling to the floor.

“THERE YOU ARE DADDY!!!” exclaimed a cheerful Kimmy.

The little Tim looked up to the now-towering form of his 5 year old daughter. Even when he got back on his feet, Kimmy was still a head and a half taller than her now 2 year old daddy. Oblivious to her father’s feelings on the situation, Kimmy was eager to play with her regressed daddy.

“Now that Kelly’s done changing you, can we go play now?” she asks her father. After the embarrassment Kelly subjected him to, Tim did not feel like putting up with more humiliation.

“Wouldn’t you rather play with your toys Kimmy” Tim asked

“I do want to play with my toys, with you Daddy” Kimmy gleefully replied, “Now that I am older than you, I get to teach you how to play!”. As annoyed as he was, Tim understood that Kimmy wasn’t trying to patronize him. Being only 5, Kimmy was just curious about her father’s regressed form, and was also excited about being a big sister. He still wished he wasn’t the one in the role of little brother.

On the other hand, knowing that Kimmy was very sensitive, he didn’t want to upset his little girl. So he simply nodded and told his daughter, “Sure Kimmy, let’s go play”, pretending to be as eager as Kimmy was. Before he could act, Kimmy picked him up the best she could, carrying him to her room. Tim found it rather surreal how big Kimmy’s room seemed now; before the regression it was fairly small, but now it seemed huge. Kimmy set him down in what appeared to be a baby seat, which began to rock back and forth a bit.

“Now you stay there Daddy while I get some things from my closet” Kimmy instructed Tim, who just sat idly in the baby rocking chair as she pulled out some dolls and other toys for girls her age.

Curious, Tim had to ask, “So what do you want to play Kimmy?”
Before long, Kimmy lifted Tim out of the seat as she said, “Tea party of course Daddy. And you get to be –“

He was so focused on getting away from Kelly that he paid no attention where he was running towards until he suddenly bumped into someone, falling to the floor.

"Are you OK, dear?" a concerned Nancy said, as she knelt down to make sure her regressed husband wasn't hurt. Once the man-turned-tot nodded and got back on his feet, Nancy proceeded to scold him for not watching where he was going. "You could have gotten seriously hurt, dear" she said firmly to Tim, as though she was addressing a child rather than her own husband much to Tim's annoyance.

"But I was trying to get far away from Kelly so that she wouldn't embarrass me anymore than she already has" whined Tim, pouting and stomping his feet at his now towering wife. However, once Tim realized what he had just done, his confrontational demeanor vanished, replaced with that of a little boy looking down in shame. Having watched her husband act like an actual 2 year old throwing a tantrum made Nancy chuckle.

"OK, OK, if you say so dear" said Nancy

"This is so humiliating" Tim whimpered

Pulling her husband in for comforting hug, Nancy simply replied "I know dear, I know". She kissed Tim's forehead, which made Tim feel a little better. Then he felt something else, namely Nancy's fingers tickling him under the arms.
"Nann--cy, wha - ar- you - doing???" Tim tried to ask, his words being cut off with laughter.
"I'm not Nancy, I'm the tickle monster!" Nancy exclaimed excitingly as she tickled her regressed baby husband. who was trying very hard to hold in his laughter. "My my, your body is much more ticklish now that you're 2" Nancy added while her husband pleaded her to stop. He tried to cover up his weak spots, however Nancy was right in her assertion that his regressed 2 year old body was much more ticklish than his adult body. Soon Tim fully succumbed to his wife's tickling, no longer able to hold in his laughter or resist.

After what had felt like forever (in actuality just a few minutes) he began to feel hungry, his tummy rumbling.

"Looks like someone's hungry" said Nancy. She carefully lifted Tim up into her arms, holding the baby husband. Of course Nancy decided to tickle Tim a little bit more before heading to the kitchen.

"Stop... it.. it's.. not.. funny.. " Tim try to say to his wife, his words being interrupted by bursts of laughter.

"I'm sorry honey. You know how much I love little kids. You're so cute I just couldn't resist" said Nancy, who gave Tim one last tickle under his arm.

After he was finally relieved of the tickling, Tim gave his wife a light hug, whispering to her that he was having fun anyway.

When they got to the kitchen, Tim noticed that there was one of Kimmy's old table boost seats, from when she was a baby, strapped onto his usual spot at the table. For him to sit in obviously. As much as Tim did not like this, at least it was less embarrassing than Kelly changing him. Sitting in what was for the time being his seat, Tim waiting anxiously for his wife, who was preparing a small bowl of cereal for him. Watching her place and stir a spoon in his cereal, Tim knew that Nancy was going to be spoon feeding him.

"The rest of the family and I have already eaten our breakfast.. before we found you like this" explained Nancy. Taking her place at the table, she turned Tim's seat towards her, placing the bowl of cereal in front of him. Preparing a spoon of cereal for him, Nancy noticed Tim looking away from her.

"I know, dear," she said, "but you are just going to have to get used to this until we can get you back to normal"

"If I can go back to normal" Tim retorted, still looking away from his wife.

"Oh don't be so doom and gloom dear" Nancy replied. She gently turned her husband's head towards her with one hand, the spoon of cereal in the other.

"Now open wide" Nancy added, feeding the spoon of cereal towards Tim. Knowing that keeping his mouth closed was pointless and because he was hungry, Tim opened his mouth, allowing the spoon to enter and exit as he chewed and swallowed the cereal. Satisfied, Nancy prepared another spoonful of cereal as Tim readied his mouth for another bite.

....


Finishing the last bite of cereal, Tim began to think about what he was going to do. In his regressed form, he had no means to act as an authority figure to his children nor could he provide for his family. While he was hoping that there was a way to reverse this change, Tim recognized that he was more likely than not stuck like this; that he would have to grow up all over again. Instead of being the father of his children, he would have to live as their new baby brother, with Nancy as his mother. That was a thought Tim did not want to spend a lot of time pondering. So he asked Nancy what the plans were for today, to which she responded:

12121222222211.title: 5 year old (Kimmy's age)

121212222222111.content: Tim could hardly believe what was happening to him. Formerly loving husband and father of 3, had been regressed to a 2 year old baby only to change once again into a 5 year old, becoming his youngest daughter's twin -
121212222222111.title: He became Kimmy’s twin

12121222222212.content:
The family stood in astonishment as the man-turned-tot grew - however it stopped once Tim looked to be around 8.

"Well it beats being 2 again I guess" Tim remarked, trying to be positive despite his predictament.

"YOU ARE NAKED!" Kimmy screamed, making Tim realize that the old toddler clothes he was wearing had broken off him (since they did not grow with him clearly). The regressed 8 year old father's cheeks turned red.

Tim turned his face towards Brad. "Got any spare clothes I could borrow for now?" he asked Brad, to two now being around the same height (give or take a few centimeters).

...

Once he was done tying the shoes Brad had lying around, Tim got up from the bed in his son's room. Since the closet doors were mirrors, Tim observed the 8 year old little boy that was his reflection. Even though he was a grown man in his 40s, the 8 year old boy in the mirror mimicked every one of his movements, no matter how subtle. "This is like incredibly weird... and astonishing" Tim thought to himself, "I could almost pass for Brad had it not been for the eyes and facial features he inherited from his mother". Now very close to the mirror, Tim began pinching the cheeks on his now youthful child face, taking note of all the freckles he had gained back because of the regression. Looking straight at the 8 year old face in the mirror that was clearly his, Tim said aloud, "Well I guess I am going to have to pass as Brad's twin brother in the meantime..." Oh well.

Heading out of the room, Tim saw that Nancy had been waiting outside.

"So I just called the doctors, and" before Nancy could finish Tim cut her off

"Before you continue with the details, I would first like to know if I am going to be stuck like this? Or if I am going to have to start calling you 'Mom' from now on?". Tim asked.

What was Nancy's reply?
12121222222212.title: 8 year old (Brad's age)

121212222222121.content:
Nancy tried to put on a smile before answering, "Well, basically while your body was fighting the virus, which might have explained your sudden progression back there, it's looking like that's the best it can do"

Tim slowly looked up. "So... that's a yes then, right?"

Nancy knelt down to meet Tim at eye level. "...Correct."

There was something else on Tim's mind as well. "I'm not going to be changing again though, am I?" Tim nervously asked.

"Maybe, I don't know honestly. The doctors said that the virus can be unpredictable" Nancy answered.

After processing all this at once, how does Tim respond to the news?
121212222222121.title: Yes

choices: Tim's first day back at school
1212122222221211.content:
At the breakfast table, Tim eats his cereal very calmly, acting as though nothing had changed.

"Honey, I went ahead and called the elementary school, they agreed to let you attend Brad's 3rd grade class... as a student ...if that's ok with you" Nancy informs TIm.

Tim turns to Nancy. "So basically I would be going to school again?" Tim asks. Nancy nods. To Nancy's surprise however, Tim smiles at the news. "Well at least I won't have to start all over in kindergarten" he jokes.

"Ahh, I want Daddy to go to kindergarten with me" Kimmy comments

"When do I start?" Tim asks Nancy before taking another bite from his cereal bowl.

"Today dear" Nancy answers

"Cool" Tim says. He finishes the last bite of the cereal before leaping off the table chair.

"You seem to be taking this rather well, honey" Nancy comments.

"Well it's not like I have much of a choice anyway, I mean I am basically stuck like this for all we know" Tim replies while stretching his arms. "and to be honest this is actually kind of cool; being a kid again" Tim admits.

"Really?!?!" the whole family replies

Tim nods. In truth, while he was going to miss adulthood and would have to readjust to being a kid again, he saw this as the perfect opportunity to bond with his only son Brad. As a father, he never really got to spend a lot of quality time with his son due to work and attending to his oldest teenage daughter and youngest daughter. Being stuck as a kid meant he couldn't really continue to work at his job anymore and father responsibilities were basically lifted off his shoulders now, which left him with more time to hang out with Brad. Although he would also be lying to say that he wasn't a tiny bit curious about reliving his childhood years.

"Hey Dad - " before Brad can finish, Tim interrupts

"It's ok to call me just Tim now, son. In fact that might be preferably while we are at school" Tim explains

"Oh ok Da- I mean. Tim.." Brad isn't so sure if he's going to get used to having Tim as "brother" rather than a father, "anyway the bus should be arriving soon". Brad points at the clock which reads close to 7:15 am.

"Sure thing, Brad" Tim comments as he heads out the door. Nancy stops him.

"Wait dear, you shouldn't forget your lunch" Nancy informs Tim, handing him a paper bag of lunch.

"Oh thanks, 'Mom'" Tim remarks with a snarky tone, though him referring to Nancy as "Mom" catches the entire family off guard. Brad and Kimmy start heading out the door, Kelly staying since Mom typically drive her to high school. Tim was about to follow his kids but then Nancy grabbed his arm.

"Wait, honey you forgot something" Nancy says

"What do you mean?" Tim whines, not wanting to fall behind, "there wasn't anytime to get me a backpack just yet"

"I don't mean that dear. I haven't given you a goodbye kiss yet" Nancy corrects him, bending downwards to place a quick kiss on Tim's now child-like cheek. It didn't take long for the cheek to turn red. "Now since when did you get embarrassed from me kissing you, young man?" Nancy remarks.

"I'm not 42 anymore Nancy..." Tim shyly remarks before heading off to follow Brad and Kimmy to the bus.
1212122222221211.title: Try to approach things optimistically

Tim breathed in and out, bracing himself before following Brad and Kimmy into the school bus.

"Name?" asks the bus driver, not recognizing the 8 year old.

"Tim... I'm... ummm.. new here..." Tim replies timidly.

"Foster child?" the bus driver asked. She had already presumed that Tim was with Brad and Kimmy.

"Uh.. sort of..." Tim knew that it would make him look crazy he if said out loud "actually I am Brad and Kimmy's father, but I've turned into an 8 year old today".

"Whatever" says the busdriver, shrugging as Tim proceeds towards the end of the bus. She must of not taken a good look at Tim, otherwise she would've wondered why this new kid looked a lot like Brad.

"Over here!" shouts Brad, having saved his father a seat. Not knowing who any of these kids were, Tim happily takes a seat next to his son.

Soon, all of their peers were staring at the two of them. Unlike the busdriver they had clearly noticed the similarities between Brad and Tim. The two grew anxious as their peers continued to stare at them, but Tim was even more nervous than Brad. How was he going to explain this to these kids?
12121222222212111.title: Tim's first day back at school

12121222222212112.content:
Nancy was preparing dinner when she heard the knock on the door. Setting aside the spaghetti noodles she was having boil. she went up to open the door. It did not take long after the door had open for Tim to jump onto Nancy with immense force. Luckily for him Nancy had managed to react quickly, catching him. "Jesus, don't scare me like that next time" Nancy said, holding her rejuvenated husband up in her arms while Brad and Kimmy entered the house.

"Sorry, just so happy to see you" Tim replied as his wife placed him back on the floor. He quickly gave Nancy another hug around her upper thighs, as his 8 year old form made him now a little less than have as tall as Nancy, his head reaching only to her waist. Nancy hugged back.

"How was school, honey?"

"Great! All the kids thought it was kind of cool to have Brad's father around but as their age."

"So they didn't keep your identity a secret?"

Tim shook his head sideways. "But it's ok. They all asked me all sorts of questions on what it's like to be grown up and how it feels to be a kid agai. Brad also helped show me around the school and class. His friends were cool too".

Nancy let out a breath. "Well as long as you are adjusting to this change, I guess it's not a problem" She bent down to kiss Tim on the forehead. The man turned boy blushed crimson red.

What happens next?

To add insult to injury, while Kelly is in the eighth grade, she will start from the sixth grade in the probable chance she will shrink a little more before stopping.

121231.content: Did it make her older or younger ?
121231.title: Kelly

1212312.content:
Kelly was rather loud-mouthed and even seemed rebellious at times, but she was actually much nicer than she looked, and only acted tough so as to not get picked on by some of the other students in her school. Her grades were average, and even though she had relatively few friends, she was very close to them. However, she always wanted to become an adult, as she was envious of the freedom they had compared to her. Sure, school allowed her to see her friends more easily, but it was still torturously boring. Also, grown-ups could go wherever they wanted whenever they wanted, while she had to stick to just wandering around her neighborhood, which was rather small. She also envied adult women for looking so attractive, and hated her own more childish features. She always sighed whenever she thought about how awesome it must be to be an adult, and was not too happy about the fact that she had to wait a few more years to actually become one. She had long forgotten how great being young was in its own right, but she was soon going to remember it.

One day, while playing volleyball during her PE class, the girl she was partnered with accidentally hit her square in the face with the ball. After apologizing, she grabbed her hand to help her get back up, which was enough for the age virus she was unknowingly infected with to spread to Kelly. Neither of the girls paid much more attention to it than that, and went on like normal, until the next day. Their breakfast routine was interrupted by their father shouting a rather loud "What the ?!" upon seeing the newspapers' headline. Naturally, the rest of the family was surprised, and asked him what was wrong :

"Look here ! On the front page ! A young 13-year old girl transformed into a baby !"

Tim's wife and children's jaws dropped to the floor, before they shouted in surprise in unison. Tim summed up the newspaper article to his family :

"Mr and Mrs Jansen had the shock of their lives when their thirteen-year old daughter Emily suddenly transformed into an infant yesterday evening. According to them, Emily started to feel weird shortly after she came home from school, but shrugged it off as just fatigue, and went to her room. About an hour later, she went to see her parents, telling them that her head hurt and she felt dizzy. Her parents went to the kitchen to fetch her some medication, only to see her clothes piled up on the floor when they got back to the living-room. After pushing them out of the way, they saw that they daughter had somehow transformed into a helpless infant. The doctor's analysis revealed that the young girl had caught an extremely rare and unpredictable disease known as the "age virus", which causes its victims to get older or younger at varying speeds. This disease is known to spread extremely fast and be very hard to detect without proper medical equipment until it transforms its victim's age."

Kelly was surprised enough, but her blood froze when she recognized the girl mentioned in the newspaper as the girl who she played volleyball with in PE the day before. She instantly told her parents about it, and they decided to bring her to their own family doctor, Dr. Ledgewood. Nancy stayed home to take care of Brad and Kimmy, while Tim drove Kelly to the doctor as fast as he could. When they got there, Dr. Ledgewood analyzed Kelly, and discovered that she had indeed caught the virus.

"Oh my gosh... Am I going to get older or younger, Mr. Ledgewood ?
-Well, my dear, it seems the virus is going to rejuvenate you. I cannot tell yet how fast you will get younger, however.
-That can't be real... Is there anything we can do to stop this disea-"

Before Kelly could finish her sentence, the virus already started to take effect. Her father and Dr. Ledgewood could only watch helplessly as Kelly transformed into...
1212312.title: The age virus

12123122.content:
As the age virus was taking its toll on Kelly's body, the young girl regressed in age. Before her father and Dr. Ledgewood's very eyes, she shrank in both size and age, and struggled to keep her increasingly bigger clothes from falling off of her.

"Oh no, I'm getting younger ! Please, Dad ! Doctor ! Help me !"

But neither of them could do anything but watch as Kelly's regression continued. After a mere minute, she was already reduced to a five-year old toddler, and started to sob and wail in fear. Did her regression stop there ?
12123122.title: Younger than that

121231221.content:
With no known way of curing Kelly of her sudden regression, the doctor gives her father pills to help her "adjust to the regression" and dismisses them. Kelly's father, Tim, places his shrunken daughter on a child's seat meant for Kimmy for the drive home. She is also forced to wear only her shirt, which was being as an extra-large dress. Although the drive back is miserable from Kelly's wailing, the two of them could at the very least take comfort that she has stopped shrinking for a while.

As soon as they arrive back home, Kelly has become quiet from tiring herself out with her pleading and crying; her eyes are still red from the tears and her nose is just as messy. Tim, being as patient and understanding as he can possibly with towards his daughter, takes her silence as an opportunity to discuss plans for the future.

"None of your clothes will fit you anymore, so you'll have to wear Kimmy's clothes for the time being." he speaks, preparing himself for another tantrum from his daughter.

Kelly revives herself with new-found indignation, "But daddy! ..."

"I'm sorry. It's all we have for you right now. You don't want to walk around the house without anything to wear, do you?" Tim tries to reason with her daughter.

"But Kimmy and Brad will make fun of me!" Kelly sniffles, completely unwilling to show herself to anyone ever again.

"They won't make fun of you," Tim tries to reassure his daughter with little to no success.

"I'll never be a grown-up now!" she shouts. At this moment, she realizes how she had taken her old life for granted, highly preferring that life right now over this. She looks down in despair, "... my life is over!"

Tim kneels down to Kelly's level, making her feel even more like a child "...We'll go talk to your mother and we'll make this work. I promise." he lightly brushes the hair on Kelly's head before walking towards the front door. Kelly braces herself for the beginning of the rest of her life as he opens the door. They immediately come face-to-face with...

121231221211111.content:
"Great, " Kimmy responded with a smile she led Kelly to her bed, "you wait right here, Princess Kelly while I set everything up." Kimmy went to work, clearing the center table of art projects.

"Can I help, Kimmy?" Kelly questioned.

"No, Princess Kelly, you're the guest of honor, you rest while I set up," Kimmy insisted.

Kelly cleared her throat, nervously, "hey Kimmy, could you not call me, Princess?"

"Why not?" Kimmy questioned.

The truth was being called Princess, especially over a tea party, made Kelly feel more juvenile. "Can we please just not?"

Kimmy smiled, "okay, because you used the magic word; how about Duchess?" Kelly shook her head. "Queen?" Kelly shook again. "Professor?" Once more, Kelly shook. Kimmy thought for a moment, "what about Lady, Lady Kelly?" To Kelly, that sounded close to being called an adult, so she nodded and was surprised when Kimmy hugged her. "Princess Kimmy and Lady Kelly, " she pronounced, "we can be like Rapunzel and Cassie on Tangled."

Kelly didn't have any idea what Kimmy was talking about but smiled and hugged back, "sounds great, Kimmy."

Finally, Kimmy broke the hug. "Okay, you wait, and I'll get the tea party set up." Having finally finished cleaning, Kimmy set up her plastic tea set and ran to her dress-up chest. Kimmy put several gaudy plastic rings on her fingers, put half a dozen plastic necklaces on, and finally placed a well-worn tiara on her head. "You should dress-up too!" Kimmy said with a smile.

"I think I'm okay, " Kelly replied.

Kimmy's smile fell, "okay."

Even now, Kelly couldn't bear to see her baby sister upset, "well, " Kelly decided, "what have you got for a simple look?"

Kimmy's smile returned as she picked up a red boa and put it around Kelly's neck. "There, " Kimmy happily stated, "now that we look fancy enough for the tea party, I'll get our guests." The five-year-old happily exclaimed as she ran to her toy box. Kelly noticed there were five chairs around the table, enough for herself, Kimmy, and three guests. "This, " Kimmy announced, holding up a Barbie doll wearing a pink glittered dress which it seemed Kimmy had modified herself, "is Lady Barbie."

"And," Kelly noted, "she's wearing a very chick outfit."

"Chick?" Kimmy repeated, confused.

Kelly blushed bright pink, "she looks very pretty" she substituted she had meant to say the doll looked chic but had forgotten about her new limited vocabulary. Kelly was embarrassed but put on a brave face for Kimmy.

"This, " Kimmy continued holding up a soft teddy bear she slept with every night. "Is Mr. Sunggle Bear!" Lastly, Kimmy pulled out a cloth doll with brown yarn for hair, a basic blue dress, and a smile.

However, this time Kelly didn't wait for introductions, instead she snatched up the doll and embraced her like a long lost friend. "Amy!" Kelly proclaimed.

"Hey, " Kimmy said with anger in her voice, "Use your words and ask, who's Amy?" She asked.

"This is Amy, " Kelly told Kimmy holding up the doll, "she was my favorite toy when I..." Kelly paused, unable to finish her sentence. "I thought I lost her," Kelly corrected.

"I found her in the basement, I called her Duchess, " Kimmy explained.

Kelly collected herself and gave the doll back to Kimmy. "Here, you can have Duchess back."

Kimmy shook her head and smiled as she put the doll in Kelly's lap, "no, you keep her, then we can play dolls together later."

Kelly gave the doll back, "I don't play with dolls."

Kimmy took the doll back with an angry look, "fine, but I'm going to call her Amy from now on, I think it's a pretty name." Suddenly, Kimmy shook her head as though confused, "what was that, Amy?" Kimmy put the doll close to her ear as though Amy were whispering something to her, suddenly Kimmy smiled, "you're right, Amy."

"What did she say?" Kelly asked.

"Amy thinks you're cranky and should take a nap," Kimmy responded with a smile. That got Kelly's temper up.

Curious, even tho she knew whom they were likely referring to, Kelly took a little peek from the door, spotting several students surrounding Kimmy.

"I've heard that your big sister will be joining our class" "but isn't she a grown up?" "Actually, my mommy told me that she got sick and turned into a kid just like the rest of us!" "Is it true Kimmy" "When do we get to meet her?!"

Kelly hid back behind the door, her face blushing violently. Now she was even more scared of presenting this new her in front of everyone. It wasn't fair. She didn't ask to be turned back into a little girl, or to be put all the way back into Kindergarten. Right now all she wanted was to meet up with her high school friends, talk about boys and their plans for life, maybe even gossip a little. But now that life was over for Kelly. Now she was being forced to attend the same Kindergarten class as her little sister Kimmy, to wear her clothes (for the time being), and grow up all over again. Kelly was thinking of sneaking away and maybe try to leave school entirely, but as she was turning around, she bumped into someone. Someone who was clearly an adult.

"Is there something wrong?" asked the figure in front of her. Kelly looked up and saw the face of a young woman who looked to be in her late 20s or early 30s. Before she could respond, the woman spoke again, "Ah you must be Kelly, Kimmy's sister", kneeling down to Kelly's eye level. Kelly quickly realized that the woman in front of her was in fact Kimmy's, and effectively now her, teacher - Miss Swanson if she recalled was her name.

"uh.. no.." Kelly denied

"Well "not Kelly" how come your name tag says 'Kelly Aran'?", Ms Swanson softly asked, as Kelly then remembered the name tag the school, and her mom, had her put on since she was a new student. Kelly knew she couldn't talk her way out of this - especially since it might get in her trouble now that she thought about it.

"y..yes..." Kelly sheepishly admitted.

"I know that this is a sudden change for you" Ms Swanson softly consoled Kelly, "I know that it's hard for you to go from a teenage girl in high school to a little girl again"

"Do you?" Kelly rudely retorted. Ms Swanson, in spite of the resistance, tried to be understanding.

"True, I may have not gotten infected with a virus - but I was once your age - a teenage girl that is. I know what it's like to be a teenage girl who just can't wait to grow up"

Kelly tried to retort, but before she could finish

"And I also know what it's like to be a little girl" Ms Swanson added.

Kelly looked down in shame. "But everyone is going to make fun of me..."

"Nobodies going to make fun of your sweety" Ms Swanson gently assured. "how about we go in together and I help introduce you to the rest of the class, ok?"

Kelly was too familiar with this tactic; the teacher wasn't asking. Kelly didn't want to stand in front of all those children, having them eye her in wonderment, or tease her for being "a baby again". However Kelly also knew that if she tried to escape, the school will just call Mom and Dad and then she'll probably be punished no differently than if Kimmy had done the same.

"You can even hide behind my legs until introduction if that makes you feel a little better" the teacher suggested.

At that moment, the 5 year old Kelly decides to....

12123122121111221.content:
Kelly sheepishly followed Ms Swanson into the classroom, hiding behind the young woman. At once, all the children's immediate attention was on their teacher.

"Good morning class" Ms Swanson greeted, the children greeted her back as a class. Kelly had forgotten that younger elementary school kids tended to greet their teacher at the beginning of each class, someone else she will probably have to force her self to do. "As some of you have heard, we have a new transfer student" Ms Swanson announced

Kelly buried her face into the teacher's legs, now even more scared to present herself as the newest member of the kindergarten class. She felt Ms Swanson's hand gently caress her head, almost as if the young woman was telling her that everything was going to be ok.

"It's ok, you can come out now" Ms Swanson whispered to Kelly. Knowing that she couldn't back out anyway, Kelly sheepishly revealed herself from behind the young woman, standing right in front of the class.

"umm... hi..." Kelly struggled to put words out of her mouth, like a stage frighten little child, "I... I'm Kelly Aran...." As she finishes her sentence, she immediately notices all the stares coming all the children.

"Aren't you Kimmy's big sister??" a random girl shouted.

"That can't be, how old are you?" another voice shouted.

Kelly sheepishly uttered "I'm... fourteen years old...", her right hand counting to 1 and her left hand counting to 4.

"You don't look fourteen!" the same voice from before shouted. Kelly blushed in embarrassment, running to hide behind Ms Swanson again.

"It's ok, dear" the young woman gently said as she gently brought Kelly back in sight. "Students, remember the rules, no shouting in class and to raise your hand and wait before asking a question. Right, Mary and Toby" she says, addressing the two who shouted earlier. The two kids apologized to the teacher.

"Now class, while Kelly is in fact Kimmy's big sister and technically actually older than each of you, she got diagnosed with a recent sickness that turned her into a little girl. The school she used to go to doesn't accept any little girls or boys, so she will be joining our class now" Ms Swanson explained the class. For some reason Kelly felt a little better, but was still a little shy. The children in front of her however seemed friendly enough at least. Ms Swanson knelt down to Kelly, directing her attention to the empty desk next to Kimmy. "We reserved a desk for you next to your sister Kimmy" She explained.

"Um,, do I have to sit right next to my sister" Kelly whispered, not wanting to sit next to Kimmy. It wasn't like she hated Kimmy, she was her sister after all, it's just that Kelly wanted as little reminders of what she had become as possible. However when the teacher explained that they felt that it would help her ease into class if she sat next to someone she already knows, Kelly knew there was no point in arguing. She proceeded to her desk, taking her spot next to Kimmy. Kimmy seemed rather happy about her formerly big sister sitting next to her.

"I'm so glad you're going to kindergarten with me now" Kimmy innocently said to Kelly.

"Sure, I guess..." Kelly whimpered

"I'll show you all the ins and outs of this class, sis. I'll even help you make so many new friends too!" Kimmy said

"But I want to be with my old friends" Kelly whimpered

"well Ms Swanson once told us that life is all about making new friends, sis" Kimmy remarked, "Besides you'll have so much more fun here than at your other class" Kimmy said, of course not knowing that high school students take several classes a year.

"Yeah you think" Kelly thought to herself.

throughout the class, Kelly starred at the whiteboard, watching Ms Swanson teach the class about Math. These were rather simplistic addition and subtraction problems, stuff Kelly herself already knew so she couldn't help but get bored. However she then remembered the doctor pills her parents were having her take to "adjust" to her regression, how the pills were going to cause her gradual mental regression over time (or make cause her to think more like her physical age). "I'm already saying 'Mommy' and 'Daddy' instead of mom and dad" thought Kelly, "... what if they make me forgot stuff too?". Kelly began to fear that the pills would also make her less and less intelligent, making her forget everything she knew until she was reduced to kindergarten level. She looked back at the Math problems on the board. She realized that even though she knew the answers to the problems that for some reason it was taking her a little longer than before to process each problem in her head. This worried her. "I don't wanna be little" she thought to herself.

A few hours later Kelly followed the rest of the classroom to the cafeteria. Ms Swanson had the class line up, placing Kelly behind Kimmy so that "Kelly wouldn't get lost". As patronizing as this was to Kelly, she figured it kind of made sense since she didn't know anyone else in this class thus she could easily get mixed up with another class by mistake. Basically for now she just had to stick with Kimmy during school hours for now. On the way to the cafeteria, Kelly recalled how each class would have some recess time after their scheduled lunch periods. This kind of made Kelly a little happy, since she remembered enjoying recess as a kid and she thought it would be fun to play some more in this body (might as well use this body for something).

Brad took off running as Kimmy leaned in to kiss him again. "Come back, Brandy!" Kimmy declared chasing her brother.

The chase finally stopped when Brad jumped over a mud puddle, Kimmy, on the other hand, stopped right in her tracks.

"Oh that's right," Brad said putting his hands in the mud, "you don't like mud do you, Kimmy?"

"Look out, here comes the mud monster!" Brad gave a roar as he turned the tables and started chasing Kimmy. Brad chased Kimmy until he saw his younger sister once again approach the mud puddle, "Kimmy, watch out!"

Too late, Kimmy slipped and plopped right into the mud and was now completely covered in the wet Earth. Brad could see tears welling up in Kimmy's eyes, "Kimmy, please," he begged.

Kimmy burst out in tears, "you ruined my princess' dress!" Kimmy took off running to the house.

"Kimmy, I'm sorry!" Brad shouted.

Tim was more than happy with his life : he was pleased with his job, his and his wife's incomes were enough to support the family should something happen to one of them, he had wonderful children and a loving wife, and he had very good friends as well. However, as pleased as he was with his life, he still wished that it was a little more exciting at times. Little did he know that his wish would be granted soon, beyond all that he had hoped...

A new, mysterious disease started spreading across the world. It was a fragile, yet very unpredictable virus, that caused whoever was infected to age faster than normal; or regress in age. There was no way to predict how a person infected by the virus could change : they could age twice as fast as normal, or even faster. Some could regress in age at the same rate they would age normally, or, once again, faster, and some unfortunate infectees could even outright transform into old folk or infants in mere seconds.

The virus had only started to spread very recently, so information about it was still scarce, to the point that many believed that it was only a silly rumor, not knowing that it was a real threat. The next victim in line happened to be Kimmy, who caught it from a young woman who was working at the preschool the little girl was attending. While Tim was watching TV with his wife and eldest daughter, he heard tiny footsteps coming their way. He turned his head, and saw his youngest daughter walking towards them. However, she had trouble standing up, and didn't look so good. Tim got worried and asked her :

"Hey, Kimmy, what's wrong ? Are you OK ?
-Daddy, I don't feel so well... My tummy hurts and my head is spinning..."

Tim and Nancy feared that their daughter had caught a pretty nasty illness, and decided to go to the doctor to see what it was. After examining the little girl, the doctor came to the following conclusion :

"I think your daughter has been infected by the age virus.
-The... age virus ? What's that ?
-Well, it's a recently-discovered disease that causes people to either age much faster than normal or regress in age. From what little we know of it, we can tell that it is very unpredictable. Some infectees can transform into old folk over months, but I've heard that some could be reverted to foetuses in mere hours."

Tim and Nancy's blood froze. They tried to hide it so as to not worry Kimmy any more than she already was, but anyone could tell that they were incredibly scared. After a moment, they asked :

"Do you know what's going to happen to our daughter ? Is she going to get older or younger, and at which speed ?
-Well, by the looks of it, it seems she will get..."

12132.content:
Nancy smiled as she watched her youngest daughter play. With her husband Tim at work, and both Kelly and Brad hanging out with their respective friends, it was just her and Kimmy in the house right now. Kimmy played with her dolls, dressing them up in all sorts of doll clothing, as Nancy watched from the couch. Normally Nancy would have been running some errands, but Kimmy wanted her mother with her while she played with the dolls. Nancy always loved little kids and watching her youngest daughter play warmed her heart.

Before long, Kimmy came up to her mother, holding up a doll to her.

"Do you wanna play with me, Mommy?" the little girl asked. Nancy chuckled

"Are you sure I'm not too old" Nancy said

"I wanna play with you though Mommy" Kimmy responded, "besides you always seem to be working, now you can have a break". That last part actually made Nancy consider playing with the dolls. She always loved little kids, partly because of having been a mother of 3 children. Though that was not the only reason, for Nancy found childhood innocence rather pure, with little children being able to live out carefree lives before they grow up in order to live in a more demanding world. If anything she somewhat yearned for those days when she herself was just a little girl around Kimmy's age.

Therefore, Nancy smiled at her daughter and said, "I guess there's no harm in having a little fun". Kimmy jumped for joy and hugged her before going back to her dolls, with Nancy following from behind. As soon as Nancy sat down near the dolls, Kimmy handed her mother a doll with long light brown hair, just like her mother's.

"Looks pretty" Nancy said as she held the doll, "though I think she would look even prettier in a cute dress".

"I know just what to give you!" Kimmy excitedly replied as she handed her mother a yellow doll-sized sun dress, alongside some doll-sized heels, sunglasses, hat, and purse of the same color. Even though she was an adult, Nancy found herself smiling gleefully as she undressed the doll to put her in the doll clothing her daughter gave her. Once the doll was all dressed up, Nancy realized something was off.

"Her hair seems a little messy" she said, "look like it needs to be brushed". Kimmy handed her mother a small doll-brush, while getting herself another doll-brush. Soon the two ladies, mother and daughter, were brushing their respective doll's hair.

"There, now she looks ready" Nancy said once she was done brushing the doll's hair.

"How does mine look, Mommy?" Kimmy asked, holding up a redhead doll, hair tied up in a pony tail, wearing a magenta blouse and black shorts.

"She looks pretty" Nancy responded, laughing happily alongside her daughter.

"I'm glad you are playing with me, Mommy" Kimmy said to her mother, "Kelly never wants to play with me"

Nancy responded with, "Well your big sister may be so eager to be an adult now that she's 'grown up', but when she was just around your age she would always want me to play dolls with her"

"Did you ever play with her" Kimmy asked innocently

"Sometimes," Nancy said, "though most of the time she would try to force her baby brother into playing dress up with her", chuckling as she said this. Soon her daughter chuckled as well, until the two of them were both happily laughing.

Before long, Kimmy innocently said, "Well even then, I hope I can be a grown up just like Kelly"

"Well...... if you ask me I would rather remain a child than be an adult" Nancy playfully responded, "that way I can always play with you." After she said this, her youngest daughter leaned closer to her.

"Would you go to the same kindergarten class as me if you become my age?" the little girl innocently asked

"Sure" Nancy said, a smile in her face as her daughter squealed in joy. Then Kimmy had another thought, and thus another question to ask her mother.

"Well let's say for some reason you had become my age and I had become your age? That way you would be the daughter and I'd be the Mommy!" she said gleefully

"Now why would you want to be the mother, sweetheart? After all, being a mother is a very hard job" Nancy playfully asked

"So that you can have a break and have fun, silly" Kimmy answered

Nancy found the gesture adorable, although Kimmy was nowhere near mature enough to understand how hard it is to be a mother, and just how much responsibility comes with being an adult. But then again, that's what Nancy found precious about childhood innocence.

Still, she responded to her daughter, "Nah...."

She continued, "besides, I'm not ready to have you have grow up just yet". Kimmy, of course, innocently insisted that she would make a great mother. The two began to let out some laughter at the remark.

"even then you would probably be wishing to be a child again." Nancy thought to herself, "I know I do".

In honesty, Nancy was actually serious about the discussion she had with Kimmy. She really did want to be a little girl again, so that she could escape from the pressures of adulthood. Being an adult was hard for Nancy, not just as a mother. Virtually every day in her life has been keeping track of finances, making sure the house was clean, making dinner for the family, and other errands. Even when there were the few moments where she would spend time with some friends or neighbors, they would mostly talk about certain responsibilities they have as adults. To add to that, she also felt very self-conscious about how others viewed her, even her own husband. She never really talked to anyone about how stressed she would feel at times, instead choosing to ignore it and put on a good face for the sake of everybody else.
Kimmy on the other hand didn't have to worry about that. Unlike Nancy, Kimmy was oblivious to the stress of adulthood; the only things she had to worry about was when it was time to eat or go to bed. Even school wasn't very demanding for children her age. Instead most of her days could be spent playing and having fun. Nancy missed the days of when she could just be a kid, and while she was playing with Kimmy's dolls she had felt like a kid for the first time in forever. Memories of her childhood were flooding her mind until she remembered something.

Kimmy noticed her mother putting down the doll. Curious as to what was going on, she asked her mother what she was doing.

"I'm just gonna get something real quick dear" Nancy replied, "I'll be back in a sec"

Kimmy let out a simple "ok" before playing with the dolls again as her mother headed into the garage.

After a few minutes, Kimmy realized her mother came back, only she was holding something in her arms.

"What's that Mommy?" Kimmy asked, pointing at what appeared to be an old doll in her mother's hands.

"This was my favorite doll when I was your age dear" Nancy answered, "since I was having so much fun playing with you, I was recalling the days I was your age. So I thought I'd bring this out again." Kimmy leaned in close, observing the old doll.

"Looks very old" Kimmy said

"I know dear," Nancy said, "just holding this makes me feel like a little girl again".

Nancy then whispered to herself, "I wish I could be a little girl again". Something began to glow. She looked down to see that it was the doll that was glowing. Only soon the glowing aura seemed to exit the doll... and enter her. Kimmy confusingly stared at her now glowing mother, who seemed to becoming enveloped in light.

"What's going on Mommy?" Kimmy said before suddenly a flash of light blinded the room.

What happened next?

Stanley tried to make a run for it but Megan grabs her arm and forces her over her knee. Megan took aim at Stanley's bottom. SMACK. "OWWWWW" Stanley shrieked Megan pulled the crying child to her face. "That missy was just a warning smack now then I have to give you a bath are you gonna be a good girl?" Megan warned.

As they were walking down the hallway Megan sniffed her former husband and said in a baby voice "now you smell all clean a yummy". Half an hour later Stanley stood in front of Megan wearing a pink dress, Mary Jane shoes, stockings, and perhaps most humiliating of all a pair of training panties his hair styled into braided pigtails a pink ribbon dangling on the end of both of pigtails. 1221121111.title: give in

choices: Megan slyly informs Stan she has registered him for a doctor's appointment.
Megan opens up to Stan about her plans, telling him about Second Chance Clinic.
12212.content:
It was the first weekend of summer vacation and Stanley was well on his way into slacking off again. The 40 year old man worked as a professor at the local university and thus had a lot of free time between semesters that he wasted away doing nothing for the upkeep of the house or for the well-being of his family.

Megan meanwhile labored long hours cleaning the house and making meals for the family on top of her part-time job as a lab technician. Stanley, a lovable sweet guy that he was, made a terrible husband. Megan sometimes considered separating from him to give him the reality check he desperately needed on being a man, but that would only ruin her precious boys' childhood. She wasn't interested in cheating on Stanley though, that would go against her Christian values. But she desperately wished there was a way to straighten him out.

Time and time again, she found herself chiding him just like one of the boys....

Stan's just an overgrown boy isn't he? Megan asked herself, already knowing the answer.

She was always gushing at old childhood photos of Stanley whenever they vised his parents house, which usually prompted her mother-in-law to tell her how much Jeremy and Billy were carbon copies of Stanley growing up. Now that she thought about it, Stanley was always gazing fondly at his boyhood photos right along side her.

She opened her laptop and brought up her mother-in-law's social media page and found the photo album dedicated to little Stanley's upbringing. She spent hours gushing and cooing at the young blond hair boy that was now a grown ass man downstairs.

Megan occasionally imagined herself as a little girl right alongside the young boy that was to be her husband. She wondered what that would have been that had been like, but the 39 year old woman knew that was a whimsical thought. Megan had a wonderful childhood herself but she didn't miss it by any means, she was an adult woman now and a mother to boot. She had responsibilities to her boys now which she realized now included her lovely husband.

Sometimes, people just need restart their lives. We can help with that.

Second Chance Clinic

The ad had been right there all along. She felt silly that she only just now recognized it. The ad featured two depressed looking women, one clearly the aging mother to the younger adult woman in her late 20's. Even for Megan's standards this young woman looked a mess, a drug addict by the look of it, but when Megan hovered her mouse over the ad the two females transformed in a bright flash of heavenly light. What came after mesmerized Megan to her core, the older woman looked years younger than Megan now. All signs of ages and wrinkles had been wiped away from the woman's happy and vibrant face.

The younger woman wasn't even a woman anymore, but rather like a cute little girl that looked ready to attend Sunday school all over again. Megan cooed at the thought that this girl had once been that sad drugged up woman seconds ago. Without hesitation she clicked the ad and was linked to the Second Chance Clinic's website.

She easily found the application page and started one immediately.

Are you looking for a Second Chance™ or are you looking to help a loved one?

Megan obviously clicked the second option.

Are you interested in attending a counseling session?

She clicked yes.

Is your loved one aware of the SCC and its mission?

This time she clicked no.

Please fill out your loved one's personal details to the best of your ability in order to receive consideration.

Megan worked away at the application for the rest of the day, only stopping to make dinner for the boys and the soon-to-be-a-boy. She had prepared spaghetti tonight and she couldn't help but giggle at how childish Stanley seemed now as he slurped up the pasta noodles which caused Billy to laugh and Jeremy to roll his eyes.

"Stan dear," Megan asked her husband, "Can you please act your age for once?"

Jeremy laughed which caused her silly husband to frown a bit.

"I'm the breadwinner honey," Stanley retorted, "I can do whatever I please. You're their mother not mine."

Megan smiled, "Yet you only respond to my nagging when I treat you like a lazy boy."

Stanley looked defensive, "I pay the bills Megan, I think I'm damn well entitled to act like a lazy boy whenever I please."

Megan agreed with all her heart. Stanley deserved to be a carefree little boy again under her thumb. She would raise him, play with him, and nurture him alongside his own sons. He would be happier being a kid again and Megan would be far happier having another growing boy in the household rather than a lazy manchild she had now.

Stanley had a man's pride though, how was she going to coax his inner child out of him? Megan considered her options.
12212.title: Just One Of The Boys

choices: 10 years old. Little Stanley would be the middle child between Jeremy and Billy.
122121.content:
Confronting Stan about his boyhood fantasies in front of his own sons would be rather embarrassing.Thought Megan. It would be better to take this slow, for now.

"Fair enough Stan." Megan said, "I just want you to be happy about your life above all else."

Stan seemed shock, "Megan you know I love you above all else."

"I know." Megan accepted his infatuation for what it was, "I love you two, I'm just getting worried about your lazy attitude hampering your health. You're already so out of shape."

"I can work on that at least." Stanley claimed. "I'll go see a doctor."

Megan smiled, "I already made you an appointment with this new clinic in town. I can take you there and get some shopping down during your check up."

"Sounds good to me dear, maybe I can treat you to dinner afterwards." Stanley said.

-------------------------------------------------------

Stanley's application with SCC was approved the very next day and Megan had scheduled an appointment for him for the end of that week. Megan allowed her husband to drive their car for what may be his very last time for many years to come. She would sooner see him playing with Hotwheels and racing games with his new brothers than behind the wheel again.

Second Chance Clinic looked no more mundane than any other doctor's office. For a place that was going to turn a 40 year old man into a child again, she figured it would look the part.

"Second Chance Clinic?" Stanley asked, "What, did they fuck up the first one?"

"Language honey." Megan chided him

Upon entering she saw a waiting room filled with everyday types. No oddities among the small group of people waiting for appointments, though the pastoral floor design brought with it hints of childhood nostalgia. She could almost picture herself a little schoolgirl again playing with the unused toys in the corner. Stanley's coveting eyes suggested he was imaging the same thing for himself.

They both approached the reception desk and were greeted by a young woman in her mid twenties.

"Hello there!" Do you have an appointment?" She chirped?

"My name is Megan Wellington and I made an appointment here for my hubby here Stanley Wellington." Megan told the receptionist with a wink.

The woman smiled, "Oh well I'll be your lovely wife was nice enough to fill out all your information for you. Stanley if you can be good and wait for just a bit we can give a quick check-up and then have a nice little counseling session."

"Sure thing." Stanley replied before turning to his wife. "Don't you want to get some shopping done?"

"I'll wait for the doctor with you first Stan." Megan said.

It wasn't long before Stan was brought into the backrooms by a young nurse. Not long after that, a female doctor waved her over.

"My name is Doctor Fairings." The red headed woman of a similar age to Megan greeted her, "You are Mrs. Wellington correct?"

"I am Doctor." Megan answered, "Can you help me with my husband?"

"Indeed I can. Come with me Mrs. Wellington, we can chat about specifics in my office." She motioned Megan into the backrooms.

Megan was getting pretty excited, she was so desperate for details she nearly jumped into the chair offered to her by Dr. Fairings.

"You seemed excited, you sure you don't want to be a little girl again yourself?' Dr. Fairings teased.

"No thank you. It's my husband that needs the second childhood not me." Megan said.

"So we're already plugging away at Stanley with some simple tests and he's responsive so far. I think we can definitely give him a Second Chance. Depending on what you want done with him." The doctor told her.

Megan explained her plight with her lazy husband and how she wanted to give him a summer vacation from adulthood in order to instill some sense into him. If he lost his adult privileges, Megan reasoned he'd be willing to be a better husband and father to her sons. Being a peer among his sons could even help with the latter role.

"Is the process reversible?" Megan asked.

"Certainly," Dr. Fairings confirmed, "but I've rarely have clients that want to go back to how they were. They are happily content growing back up again the old fashion way."

"Really?" Megan asked.

Dr. Fairings elaborated, "Physical regressing an adult into a child is one thing but this clinic specializes in mentally readjusting a client for a proper Second Chance. Sometimes that means completely wiping away their adult knowledge, maturity, and even memories to set them on the right path. But most like to keep their memories so they have a sense they are improving upon their old lives as they grow up all over again. Others though just get the get their maturity wiped so they can fit in with their new peers while having their adult minds."

"What do you recommend?" Megan asked.

"If your goal is to teach your husband a lesson than you certainly need to keep his memories." Dr. Fairings reinforced. "But I think you should wipe his adult knowledge and maturity. It's my favorite option personally, Stanley will know he was your grown-up husband and why he was regressed but he'll be a boy of his new age through and through. Speaking of which, have you decided what age you want to make Stanley?"

Megan had been considering this all week. She wanted Stanley's Second Chance to really impact him and she had been thinking about all the new family dynamics her rejuvenated husband would create in the Wellington family.
122121.title: Mother Knows Best

choices: Keep him awake. This should be a postive and enjoyable experience for Stanley.
Sedate him. Megan can brief Stanley on his new life when he wakes up.
1221211.content:
"Stanley never had any siblings growing up the first time around and I definitely think that's why he was so insistent we have our second son Billy before Jeremy got too old." Megan explained.

"And how old is Jeremy?" Dr. Fairings asked.

"He's 12 years old, he's a rising 7th grader." Megan elaborated before continuing, "Billy on the other hand is 8 years old and is a rising 3rd grader."

"Can I assume you want to put your soon-to-be-little-husband in between them?" Dr. Fairings asked.

Megan nodded, "I'm really thinking so. Stanley would love being a tween again. He would be old enough to play with Jeremy and his friends over the summer but young enough to be considered a rising 5th grader; in case you're right about him not wanting to grow up again. I can send him back to elementary school worry free that he can protect his soon-to-be-little-brother from bullies."

"Sounds like you've decided then." Dr. Fairings said before continuing. "We can schedule-in Stanley for his Second Chance right now. We have time available to us. Do you want to proceed?"

Megan lit up, "Definitely, I really think Stanley needs this release from his adulthood."

"Stanley is still in the dark about this, is he not?" Dr. Fairings asked, "We technically need a signature from him consenting to his regression but most don't read the fine print we have in this situation. We could just sedate him afterwards and transform him while he's taking his last big boy nap or he can experience the regression completely consciously. Which would you rather do Mrs. Wellington?"
1221211.title: Monkey In The Middle

choices: Stanley smiles, this was everything he wanted and more. He thanks his new Mom.
Stanley throws himself at Dr. Fairings, surely she could make him a big again.
12212111.content:
Stanley had been absentmindedly waiting for a Doctor Fairings to administer some kind of shot to him when his wife Megan came in instead. The brunette hair woman made his heart flutter, he hadn't expected her to see him like this in this awkward position.

"Megan, honey." Stanley spurred, "What are you doing here?"

"I was talking with the doctor sweetheart." Megan told him as she handed him a sheet of paper, "There's some last minute paperwork you need to sign before you can be cured from this lazy, lethargic state you're constantly in."

"Should I read it?" Stanley asked, "It's just some mumbo jumble right?"

"You should Stanley, but I know my husband well enough to know he won't bother.' Megan stated not unkindly.

"Whatever." Stanley said with a snide, "I know my wife well enough to know she'll take care of me no matter what."

Megan looked like he was holding back a wave of emotion as he signed the paperwork. He didn't have time to even review what he had just done, as Dr. Fairings entered the room with a large shot already prepared.

"Hello Stanley." the doctor said rather teasingly, "Are you tired of being a big lazy man?"

"What?" Stanley asked as he instinctively raised his arm for the woman despite her mocking tone.

Megan coughed abruptly, "Stanley I love you so, so much. But you're just not a good husband to me nor are you a good father to your own sons."

"What the hell are you talking about!" Stanley yelled as Dr. Fairings injected the needle into his arm.

"There it's done, there's no going back now Mrs. Wellington. You can tell him." The doctor informed his wife.

"Stanley, I think you need some fresh perspective on what adulthood is. It's not just about working hard and paying bills and I think the only way you can learn this is by losing what you never appreciated."

"But I'm a grown man Megan-"

"Not for long big boy." Dr. Fairings interjected, "The chemicals in that shot are preparing your body to undergo a rapid de-aging process on the physical and mental level. However, the first thing to go in adults is their maturity level which should kick in soon."

'No, no no." Stanley whined, "Megan I'm your husband! Why would you do this to me!"

"You're going to love being a kid again so much Stan" Megan claimed. You're going to have a whole new relationship with Jeremy and Billy and me as your mom. No more work, no more responsibilities, no more adult worries. You're going to get the perfect carefree summer childhood you always wanted. Isn't that amazing? Just designated bathtimes and bedtimes for little Stanley with his brothers going forward."

Stanley was about explode with rage when the chemicals pounded him all at once. In an instant he felt his masculine self-image and manly strength give way. Allowing the little immature boy he always knew was deep inside him to come back out.

"You'll be my mom?!?!!?" Stanley childishly complained.

"The chemicals are taking effect let's get him to the chamber," Dr. Fairings explained before adding, "he'll respond positively to mothering from you now."

"Come on Stanley." Megan nudged him gently off the clinical table. "Let's get you down to your rightful size."

Stanley walked awkwardly in his adult body which tightly held Megan's hand. It didn't feel right being so big and he wanted to stop feeling weird to all the giggling nurses looking at him and yet he knew he was normal right now. He was a big grown man. Megan was his wife, not his mom.

"You're such a good boy Stanley," Megan praised him as they reached the chamber room that was to initiate the physical and mental regression process

Stanley felt proud in that moment despite himself, Megan was so good to him. Maybe this was for the best...

The big boy climb into the chamber and laid down flat on his back. With both Dr. Fairings and his mom.....Megan present. The chamber activated and Stanley felt his adult knowledge being sucked out of him. Soon he felt his body physically rewind itself through puberty, his legs and arms shortened as the muscles disappeared entirely. It felt so good to Stanley, it felt right. He then felt a sudden shock to crotch as his manhood shaped itself back into innocent boyhood.

he knew it was done.

Finally gaining some control over his emotional state, Stanley crawled out of the chamber when it unlocked. Megan seized him into his arms almost immediately.

"Stanley!" Megan exclaimed, "You are so ADORABLE!!!! Look at you!"

"She's right little boy." Dr. Fairings teased as he held up a small mirror to his face. "You make a cuter kid than a lazy man."

The blond hair boy staring back at Stanley looked like the little boy that he gazed nostalgically at in his 5th grade year book. His bright green eyes held genuine curiosity again while his cherubic nose was complimented by freckles. The cute frown the boy's face made was almost immediately corrected into a bucktooth smile when he saw how adorable the dimples made him look.

This was him now. Gone was the grown up man he had been minutes ago. Now Stanley was just a 10 year old kid all over again.
12212111.title: Stanley Gets His Second Chance

choices: Jeremy: His big brother wouldn't be mean to him, Stanley was sure of that.
Billy: His little brother was easy to get along with, even if he was jumpy.
122121111.content:
Little Stanley marveled at his prepubescent form that was barely covered by an adult's medical robes that was at risk of slipping off him. He never once imagined that he would find himself occupies his little boy's body once again, and yet Mom (Megan Stanley reminded himself) had just done so to him.

Stanley smiled and kissed his new Mom on the check, "Thank you Mom! I feel so much better being a boy than being as a man!"

"I know sweetheart, I know." his Mom said with jubilation as she released him from her grasp. "But you need to thank Dr. Fairings here too Stanley you should still know that."

"Thank you," Little Stanley stammered, "Dr. Fairings."

Dr. Fairings knelt before him and gave him a smooch on his boyish lips. "You're welcome Stanley, I know it's difficult for a big burly man like you to admit he's happier being a little kid again. But that's just one step of the process of getting a Second Chance. You're going to have to learn how to be a 10 year old kid again: that means accepting that your wife is your new mom now and that you have to obey her, that mean accepting that you can't boss Jeremy around anymore as a dad but play and listen to him as a little brother, and that means accepting that you can't protect Billy as a man anymore but look out for him as his big brother."

Little Stanley hadn't even thought about any of that, he was younger than Jeremy now. Unreal, Jeremy was just a big silly middle school kid.

Dr. Fairings administrated a second check-up in the room whilst he rummaged through his new childish reality. He scared noticed when she cupped his boyhood in her large womanly hands to check its length and stimulation. The sensation of which made him giggle a high pitch that made his mom laugh. Stanley still had his memories of his adult life, which included his sexual encounters with Megan before she became his mom. That said, 40 year old man turned 10 year old boy was also fully innocent from sexual knowledge as well as his pubescent development.

Stanley liked the way Dr. Fairings touched him with a teasing tone to his former masculinity but he had no bodily recourse to reciprocate.

Standing naked in the hallway before group of mischievous nurses, that he realized had witnessed his last moments as a grown man, Stanley stood perfect still on a weight and height measuring device before Dr. Fairings and Mom.

"Your little Stanley is approximately 4 and half feet and 78 pounds." Dr. Fairings informed Stanley's new mom, "That's average height for a boy his age though he is a little overweight. That's to be expected though."

Megan looked at him inquisitively, "What do you mean by that? Isn't this supposed to be Stanley exactly as he was 30 years ago"

"This isn't time travel Mrs. Wellington." Dr. Fairings explained, "We didn't pull your former husband's childhood self from the past here, we literally turned a man into a child. That means Stanley's body type was simply translated into an appropriate childhood variant. That includes the extra bit of baby fat he has now."

"Am I fat Mom?" Stanley asked.

'No, you look fine Stanley, you're not even chubby." Mom reassured him. "You're just out of shape compared to how I see your brothers."

"A carefree boyhood summer playing with your new brothers should do the tick I imagine." Dr. Fairings said.

Stanley and his new mom were then led to the dressing room where Stanley's old clothes from his adult life were returned to his mom. The Second Chance Clinic provided age appropriate clothes for their transformed patients gratis, but they were all branded with the company and its logo.

Still getting used to even walking at a decent pace in his preteen boy, little Stanley didn't complain when his wife turned mother helped him slip a pair of boy's briefs up his short legs and around his newfound boyhood.

"You're such a good boy Stanley." Mom praised him to his guilty pleasure. "Why don't you pick some clothes out for yourself. I shouldn't have to do everything for you after all."

He choose out a pair of stylish red Bermuda shorts that he put on by himself in front of the two grown women at his side, he then proceeded to scan the T-shirts but they all had something embarrassing referencing the patient's former adulthood on the front.

"Hey honey, I this this cute don't you?" His mom held out a cyan T-Shirt with a dark blue font that read:

Formerly A Man,
Now Just A Boy

Stanley liked the color and there weren't any embarrassing images on it so he took from his new mom and snaked his arms and head through the fresh fabric. It fit him the man turned boy like a glove.

Little Stanley soon found himself exiting the clinic with his mom and waving goodbye to Dr. Fairings.

"Enjoy your Second Chance Stanley!' Dr. Fairings cheered as they drove off.

"I just drove the car here didn't I?' Stanley asked from the backseat of the car.

"You did Stanley, I almost wanted to tell you to savor it since you're not going to be anywhere near this front seat for a long time." Mom told him.

"So I'm not dreaming? I'm really 10 years old again." Stanley asked himself, the implications of his boyish fantasy finally dawning on him

"For the summer Stanley." Mom reminded him, "Think of this as a vacation from adulthood. If you're a good boy this summer for your mommy, I'll bring you back here and make you my husband again. Deal?"

"Do the boys know about this?" Stanley asked.

"Those boys are your brothers now." Mom reminded him, "And no, Jeremy and Billy will find out about you when we get home."

"So am I sleeping with one of them now?" Stanley asked, "I can't....I can't do...... grown-up things with you anymore."

"Stanley you can come cuddle with me anytime like Billy does occasionally. There's nothing wrong with a boy wanting to find confront in a woman's embrace." Mom said as she paused.

Stanley still knew that tone from his former wife, "But..."

Mom continued, "But you're a young boy now and you guys love kicking your legs around energetically. You can sleep with me if have a bad dream or something but we should start you off with one of your brothers."

"Share a bed with Bill or Jeremy? Are you crazy?" Stanley whined.

"It's not a big deal Stanley you're barely a preteen." Mom said, "Think of it like having a sleepover every night, doesn't that sound fun?"

Little Stanley considered his options. Jeremy had bigger bed, video games, and a computer in his room; but he was also a bully. Stanley wasn't sure if Jeremy would be cool letting him share any of it. On the other hand Billy had a smaller bed, a lot of toys, and a tablet in his room; but he was a scaredy-cat and afraid of everything. Stanley thought that could get annoying but at least he could boss Billy around if he needed to.

This was Stanley's first real big kid choice in his Second Chance as a little kid. He pondered it well.
122121111.title: Stanley Wellington: Formerly A Man, Now Just A Boy

choices: Billy is ecstatic his dad is a a kid again, but Jeremy thinks he's a big dork.
Jeremy is pleased to have a cool little bro now, but Billy whines and complains.
1221211111.content:
Stanley lazily kicked his feet, which now hung above the car's floor, as he wondered which of his sons would take him in. The paternal love he held for both boys as a man was long gone, replaced now with a boy's folly on which of his brothers was cooler to hang out with. With his adult memories little Stanley thought back to how both boys acted and knew that Billy was a crybaby that loved to whine about everything. Still, newly regressed 10 year old felt a bit nervous about meeting Jeremy in his state. He couldn't imagine how Jeremy would look from his new perspective and it kept him on guard.

Dr. Fairings words came back to him in that moment, "that mean accepting that you can't boss Jeremy around anymore as a dad but play and listen to him as a little brother."

The simplicity of the doctor's words seemed like a tall order to the middle aged professor turned rising 5th grader. He deeply rejoiced in the newfound youth his wife turned mom had given him, but there was also potential for deep embarrassment as well. If Jeremy laughed at him and bullied him or even worse, if his students at college ever saw him as a tween boy, Stanley wouldn't be able to handle the shame of returning to his old adult life and facing them again.

Despite all of this though, Stanley was still boyishly enthralled at having the prospect of having a big brother. He giggled in his carseat of the long hours he would spend playing videoegames with Jeremy that he had often restricted him from before. He totally thought he was stupid for doing that as a man but that wasn't the case anymore. The two would have a blast!

"I'll sleep with Jeremy!" Stanley blurted out with enthusiasm

Megan smiled, "I figured that you want to share his room."

"Can I?" Stanley asked.

"Of course my sweetie." Megan responded before continuing, "But you know that Jeremy is being a bit weird with puberty right now."

"Puberty?" Stanley asked, "That's like when a kid.... grows up.... right?

"Yes Stanley, I'm proud you still know that baby." Megan praised him, "He's becoming a teenager, growing up into a man."

"Like I was." Stanley said, "But what does that have to do with me sleeping with him? I did it when I was a grownup."

"Yes you did Stanley but you're a boy now, you're both just preteens still, but Jeremy might feel a little weird shacking up so close against you. I'll probably have to get you two a bunk bed, so he can have some personal space to himself."

The deeper meaning of the words flew over Stanley's innocent mind, "A bunk bed?!?!?! That's awesome!"

Megan laughed, "Who knew all my little husband needed was a bunkbed to be happy with his life, but Jeremy gets to choose top or bottom since it's his room after all."

Stanley moaned in disappointment knowing the older kid would surely pick the top bunk, setting a pace for Stanley's Second Chance at a boyhood summer.

Megan made it clear she was more interested in reintroducing Stanley back into the family pack as a child than procuring anything else today. Jeremy and Billy had been home long enough at their age and procuring any clothes, toys, and supplies for the 10 year old boy's summer would have to wait until tomorrow. The starter pack of clothes and supplies provided by Second Chance Clinic would be enough for now. The pack included a child's toothbrush with a bubble gum flavored toothpaste, a special boy's shampoo and bodywash that would help clean little Stanley of the remaining adult skin and hair particles that survived his age regression, a pair of blue jammies for the first bedtime of his second childhood, and a pair of children's socks and briefs for him to slip into when he woke back up into his childish new reality.

By the time Megan pulled into the Wellington's household in summertime suburbia, little Stanley's thoughts of wanting pizza or Chinese for dinner were replaced with the foreboding worry of meeting his own sons as a 10 year old boy.

His new brothers were awaiting their mother and father; not the lioness bringing back a new cub to the pride, and this cub had just been a mighty lion.
1221211111.title: Jamming With Jeremy

choices: 4 years old. Stanley will be the youngest child of the family.
1221212.content:
Megan considered the 4 year age gap between Jeremy and Billy. It was good fit for them and she considered fitting Stanley among them as their new brother. Why not make him a 4 year old? He would be more easily accepted by his sons if he was younger than both of them. Besides Stanley lazed about doing nothing but playing napping all day, from experience she knew Jeremy and Billy had been like that as 4 year olds and Stanley had likely been as well.

He would be close enough to a toddler in age to require personal attention from Megan but old enough to be potty trained.
1221212.title: Stanley The Prechooler?

choices: keep him awake; this should be a positive experience for Stanley
Sedate him.  I'll brief him on his new life when he wakes up
12212121.content:
"Well there's a 4 year age gap between Jeremy and BIlly, who are 12 and 8 respectively, which I've always felt fit so nicely within our family. So I think it would only make sense to bring my husband down to an age that fits that gap. I can't really have him be 16 since that's still close to adulthood, so I think it would be a good idea to bring my husband back all the way down to the age of 4; he would be nothing more than a little toddler" Megan explained.

"4 years old, huh. Is that your ideal choice?" Dr. Fairings asked.

Megan nodded. "Having Stanley be younger than the boys would make it easier for them to accept him as their new brother. Also in such a state my soon-to-be-little Stanley would need the constant attention of a mother such as myself, thereby taking away all the privileges he enjoyed as a man, which of course is the point in all this. And considering that all he essentially does right now is eat, play and sleep, having Stanley as a toddler wouldn't really be all that different from having him as a husband the way he is right now".

Megan added, "Also if I decided to keep him like this after the summer is over, he would learn to forgive me by the time he turns 18 again".

"So it's decided then?" Dr Fairings asked Megan one last time. Megan nodded once more as Dr Fairings gave her the necessary paper work.

"We can go schedule Stanley up for an appointment immediately if you like, though if I recall correctly, your husband is still in the dark about this" Dr Fairings asked

"Yes Dr. I prefer that he not know about this until the appointment" Megan answered

"Now we usually need a signature of consent from the patient before he proceed with the Second Chance" Dr Fairings said. "However," He added, "nobody really ever reads the fine print, so I wouldn't worry too much about your husband finding out about this"

"Thank you doctor" Megan said as she signed her portion of the paperwork (meant to make her Stanley's caretaker in his regressed state). "Can we go ahead and do this tomorrow Dr? I want to do this as soon as possible" Megan asked

Stanely headed to the clinic without question, knowing his wife would be too stubborn. Once Tim was far enough away, Megan opened the back trunk to pull out a special toddler's booster seat. She quickly got the booster seat set up in the car, all the while thinking about how her husband Stanly would be riding home in it.

Once she finished setting the car seat in place, she quickly grabbed the papers for Stanley to sign before heading off to the clinic. She met up with Stanley, who was alone in the waiting room.

"Not a very busy place" Stanley noted, "anyway I was told to wait a few minutes"
