Stanley looks at Megan. "You go one ahead honey. I'll be waiting her in case they need me" Megan tells her husband.

"Well alright..." Stanely says as he follows the nurse. Megan smiles to herself.

...

Stanley takes a seat in the room where he meets the doctor. The doctor instructs him to lay on the operating table, which he obeys.

"So what's going to happen now" Stanley asked.

"You are just going to have to trust me" the doctor replies. Then to Stanley's shock, the doctor places a mask over his face - the kind for making you breathe the sleeping gas. Stanley tries to resist, but realizes that his arms and legs are strapped. Before long he gives in to the sleeping gas...
122121212.title: Sedate him.  I'll brief him on his new life...

1221212121.content:
Regaining consciousness, Stanley groggily opens his eyes. His vision is still a little too blurry with the lights shining straight in his eyes.
As he tries to sit up and run his eyes, he realizes that he feels kind of funny.

His vision cleared up, he takes a good luck at his surroundings. He is in bed in a hospital room. Only there was one strange detail - everything looked very big. Even the bed.

"Where am I?" He says, only to cup his hands over his mouth. Something wasn't right. Those words had clearly come out of his mouth, but that was not his voice. It sounded higher pitched and a lot - younger.

Now that he thought about it, his hands seemed smaller. And from taking a peak under the covers, so were his legs - and privates... He runs his hands across his face which does not feel as tired and wrinkly - instead it feels rather soft and plunk.

"This isn't real" Stanley said to himself

Before long, he heard someone enter the room. He was expecting a nurse to greet him but instead he spotted his wife Megan - she too looked a lot taller than usual.

"Confused?" Megan asks as she takes a seat next to the bed, facing a rather nervous Stanley.

"This isn't what I think it is, is it?" Stanley asks, sheepishly with his new voice.

"It is dear." Megan replies, "you are now a 4 year old"

It takes several seconds for that to process in Stanley's mind. He could not believe what he heard. "I don't understand. What went wrong"

"Nothing went wrong dear. The Second Chance Clinic is a age regression facility. People come here to relive their youthful days temporarily - unless circumstances dictate otherwise."

"And you know about this?"

Megan nodded.

"But why?"

"Honey, I love you very much, but let's face it you are not a very good husband or father for our kids. All you do at home is nap in your chair." Megan explains

"So is this to punish me then?" Stanley asks

"In a way yes." Megan remarks "for the rest of the summer you will be a 4 year old boy"

"This isn't what I signed up for-"

"Actually, this is exactly what you signed up for remember?" Meghan's words put a look of horror and realization on Stanley's face "you had signed a legally binding contract that you cannot be restored into an adult till the end of summer. Maybe this will teach you to read the fine print from now on too" Megan told her shrunken husband

"But Megan -"

"Another thing, while you are in this regressed state, I will not be your wife. Instead I will be your mother and our kids will be your older brothers. So call me Mom - or Mommy"

Stanley is not sure how to take all this. As far as he knew, his wife had tricked him into becoming a little kid again.

6' 2" Gerald Timpko glowered at the wound at his hand. His wife Tammy the brunette beauty whose gentle hands tended his slight flesh wound. She took over babying him when he got bitten tearing a part of her shirt to bind his wound. Now that they were at home she unwrapped his hand and ran it under the faucet. She tenderly applied salve to the wound that still throbbed radiating throughout Gerald's hand. She softly applied the gauze with the skill of a nurse than bound it snugly. Tammy asked, "Why did that little girl bite you?"

Gerald responded, "I don't know she looked lost and confused so I went to her and touched shoulder asking her what was wrong and she bit me. She ran off without saying anything." Gerald scratched his head still puzzled by what happened. He rubbed his hand where the bite kept throbbing but felt a lot duller now.

Tammy shoved his hand away and with concern told him, "Don't touch it you'll only make it worse. Honestly, I think I should drive you to the hospital to get it checked out."

Gerald played down the seriousness, "Honey, it barely pierced my skin it is fine. Let's just go to bed and call it a night."

13523.content:
Gerald awakes up in the night with a strange tingling in his hand. Sleeping next to his wife her arm draped over him. He tries to slip out of bed trying to not wake his wife. He guides her arm softly to the bed as he makes his way to the bathroom. Gerald hears his wife stir as he shuts the door and turns on the light in the bathroom. Gerald quickly peals the bandages from his hand as the tingling spreads through his whole body.

Tammy calls out, "Are you okay honey? Your hand isn't bothering you is it? I can throw on some clothes and take you to the hospital."

Gerald says, "I think the bandages were a little tight and are itching." He hopes to allay some of her fears as the hair on hand begins to disappear. Tammy opens the door to make sure everything is okay and finds herself eye to eye with Gerald who is now her height maybe a little shorter. Gerald stares bewildered at his wife as he shrinks to barely above Tammy's waist. Hair began to pour from his head passing his shoulders forming a hood around his head. Gerald pulled back the hair so he could see. When he pulled back the hair the face of a little girl revealed itself. Tammy stared in horror at what had become of her once manly husband.

She timidly asked the little girl before her, "What just happened?" Tammy grabbed a scrunchie from a drawer in the bathroom cabinet she quickly grabbed up Gerald's long hair and fixed it into a pony tail.

"I don't know honey, I am just as lost as you are. I have never heard of anything like this before. I know a doctor can't help me though. I guess we should check online and see if anyone has heard of this." Gerald spoke in a little girls voice which sounded natural coming from the child's body. The disturbing part knowing that it should be an adult man speaking.

"My friend Maxine dabbles who does some occult stuff. I can try to get a hold of her. I just worry that it will be hard to convince someone. I think we should start fresh in the morning. I can pick up some clothes for you tomorrow because nothing we have will fit. Your t-shirt now fits like a night shirt now. You know you do look cute though." Tammy pulled you in for a hug.

"Thank you for that, I have been worried about that. I kind of want to jump on the computer but I understand what you mean I am exhausted. A fresh start sounds best we'll get started in the morning, I hope I don't have any further changes though. You aren't ready to take of a baby. I am not prepared for you to be my mommy. I will love you through anything though beautiful." Gerald spoke with a smile. He wanted to reassure his wife.

Tammy returned Gerald's smile, "I would be a great mother and I think you would make an adorable baby. But seriously I love you and we will face this together."

135231.content:
Gerald awoke in the morning to the amazing smell of bacon. He slid out of bed dropping his feet to the floor. He stumbled slightly unused to his shorter stature. He brushed a few stray long blond hairs from his face. He had hoped the transformation was a strange dream in the night. But it felt more real looking upon a room that now looked oversized. He imagined himself Alice from Alice in Wonderland. He probably looked like her with golden hair and blue eyes. He shuffled his small feet to the bathroom the cool floor caused him to shiver shaking his hair about. Afterwards he stretched to wash his hands awkwardly in the sink. Splashing some water on his face he felt fully awake and made his way to the kitchen. Gerald walked in on his wife as she waited for the waffle maker to beep. He said, "Good morning beautiful thank you for breakfast." He lifted himself up on to a chair at the table his feet dangling a few inches from the floor.

Tammy turned and smiles at Gerald, "Your welcome and how is my sweet little girl this morning? I figure I can call my friend Maxine after breakfast." Tammy turned away hearing the beep of the waffle maker. She fixed his plate up and set it in front of him, she down with her own and began eating.

Gerald looked up at Tammy with a smirk, "Mommy why didn't you cut my waffle into little pieces?" He made a pouty face to his wife.

Tammy finished chewing and swallowed analyzing her husband. "I'm so sorry sweety I forgot. I am glad I married someone that even in bad times can have a good time." She got up and kissed you on the cheek hugging you close.

"I try to roll with the punches. I can also imagine a lot of worse things to happen to me than turning into an apparently healthy young child. Well, let's finish up breakfast and call up Maxine and see if we can fix this." Gerald gave a reassuring smile to Tammy.

"Your right let's hope it doesn't get any worse though. What'll you do about work on Monday if we can't fix this during the weekend?" Tammy asked while returning to her eating her food.

"I can work from home really. I will shoot out an email to let them know. I just go into the office to get out of the house so I don't seem like such a hermit." Gerald said returning to eating after. After they both finished up Gerald grabbed the dishes and put them in the dishwasher while Tammy made a call to her friend Maxine.

Tammy came back with a chagrined look and said, "I caught Maxine off guard but she believed me. She said she knew I wouldn't joke about something as crazy as this. Maxine said to come over when were ready. She sounded excited about helping. I don't know what we have that will really fit you though. Oh, I know I will run out and grab you some clothes after I measure you." Tammy ran and grabbed her tape and sized Gerald up before running to the store. Gerald threw on the television while he waited for Tammy's return. He found the news harder to follow so he turned to cartoons instead. He only looked up when Tammy came in the front door.

Tammy helped him get dressed and he joked about how he never thought she would help him get into another girls panties. Tammy had bought him a cute sky blue dress because she said a pull over dress would be easiest. Gerald suspected Tammy just thought he would look adorable in it. Gerald hopped into the car before she could ask about taking a picture.

The driving to Maxine's remote home took an hour. The rural area made Gerald feel like he was entering a horror each time. Still, Maxine had modernized the old farm house and out building and it looked pleasant enough. They pulled up the driveway and made their way to the door.

1352311.content:
Maxine shoved open the door beckoning the couple in. She smiled at them with a little worry on her face she called to them, “Welcome Tammy and I am going to assume that you are Gerald. I can’t believe I am going to examine a full body transformation.”

Tammy asked, “Hi Maxine thank you for seeing us. Do you think you can help Gerald?” She walked in the house with Gerald’s small hand in hers out of instinct. She sat down on a soft couch with Gerald next to her.

Maxine responded, “I am not sure it depends what the source of the transformation is. I am really an amateur at this really. I will do my best of course. I need some of Gerald’s blood, hair, and saliva to run some tests.”

Gerald’s normal confidence alluded him remaining silently nervous his legs swinging impatiently. Tammy spoke up again, “Whatever it takes as adorable as he is right now I want my handsome husband back.”

Maxine proceeds to collect a sample by swabbing Gerald’s mouth and brushing the long golden hair taking a few stray hairs. Maxine uses a lancet needle normally used by diabetics to test their blood. With a yelp from Gerald she gets three smears of blood on glass slides. Gerald sucked on her sore finger. Maxine said, “I will be a while so make yourself at home. I got snacks in the kitchen with juice in the fridge. Tea if you want to make some. Oh, I have some movies Gerald can pick from in the cabinet.”

Maxine then leaned up to Tammy whispering, “Let Gerald pick the movie I wish to see his choice.” She stood up walking out of the room excited to examine the items with her tools.

Gerald forgot the ache in his finger excitedly rushing to the cabinet. Opening it to reveal a wide array of genres. He normally liked action movies but right now he seized Frozen rushing to the dvd player to get it started. Tammy watched shocked by her formally masculine husband’s choice. Tammy kept silent as her husband hopped up on the snuggling next to her.

Maxine came out halfway into the movie gesturing for Tammy to come talk with her in the kitchen. She glanced at the television frowning at the screen. Tammy hurried to the kitchen leaving Gerald entranced by the movie. Maxine proceeds to tell Tammy, “I think I know the type of curse Gerald is under. The curse has an enticement bag involved in it. The bag holds personal items of the victim and some items that drive the course of the curse. My guess the items are turning him into a cute little girl. The good news is if we get the bag I can cure him. The bad news is that you have to find where it is.”

Tammy replied, “Thank goodness that he can be cured. I will try to think of who would do this to him.”

Maxine said, “I can watch Gerald while you investigate. She will begin to act more like the little girl he appears. He will forget himself as time progresses. I don’t think he will be much help to you. I am sorry I couldn’t be more help.”

“You have been an immense help at least I know what is going on. I also have a direction to go in. I will take you up on your kind offer. I will start now so it doesn’t get much worse for Gerald. It might take a few days I hope that is okay? Thank you so much for all of this.” Tammy hugged Maxine before going out to Gerald to say goodbye as she headed out the door.

Maxine called after Tammy, “Take your time it will be fun playing mommy.“ Tammy shook her head at Maxine’s attempt at humor or comfort not knowing which.

Tammy hated the thought of trying to locate Gerald’s exes’. Gerald never spoke of any bad break up but one never knew how an ex truly felt about the matter. Gerald’s best friend Joe might know the mystery enemy. She decided to drive and question Joe. She dialed Joe’s number while stopped at a light.

“Hey beautiful what can I do for you? Is Gerald with you? We need to set up a golf outing soon.” Joe asked. Tammy smiled at his usual casual flirting it let her imagine everything was normal.

Tammy responded, “I wondered if I could come over? Gerald is in a jam and I thought you would know who wants to harm him.” She listened intently as she drove the car.

Joe said, “Of course you can come over. I don’t know anyone he could hate that silly lug Gerald. What is the matter? If someone is threatening him you should go to the police.” Joe sounded worried.

“Thanks I will explain more when I get there. Talk to you soon bye.” Tammy said not wanting to try to explain on the phone. She hung up after Joe said goodbye. She decided that right now she needed to focus on finding the culprit. It might be related to his job. Joe worked a the same company so he would know any work beefs. Inside the bathroom she immediately checked the toilet paper roll. She previously got burned by Joe forgetting to replace it. Sure enough it was empty again. She opened the cabinet under the sink to find a roll. Tammy found a large cloth bag underneath. Tammy felt energy exuding from the bag as she reached for it.

14423.content:
Melanie looked at a clock on the wall. It was 3:05 AM.
"Oh, I should be getting home now. Come on, Alicia, let's go." Melanie said to her sleeping friend.
Melanie, who had drank five beers that night and didn't have much of an alcohol tolerance, did her best to walk Alicia out to her car, staggering the whole time. Gracelessly, Melanie put in her keys, stumbling the whole time, and started driving home. Her judgment totally impaired, she took the freeway home as a shortcut, but got on the wrong entrance ramp, and went the wrong way. She didn't notice what she had done until it was too late.
"Oh crap!" Melanie said, seeing an oncoming car.
She tried to swerve, but it was too late. Melanie caused a head-on collision.

____________________________________________________________________

Paramedics were quickly called to the scene. They tried their best, but Melanie and Alicia were broken up pretty badly. The driver of the other car was killed instantly. Before long, Melanie was in a hospital bed, her ribcage shattered, her legs bot broken, her spine shattered. She was paralyzed from the waist down. Alicia got it worse, her lungs had collapsed so she required a breathing tube in her throat, and her skull fractured, leaving her brain damaged. Both girls were badly burned in the ensuing fire that broke out after the collision. Both were asleep in a coma. The two of them were together in an ICU room at the hospital in two adjacent beds. Melanie's mom called. Once she arrived she burst into tears seeing her daughter covered in dressing and smelling of burnt flesh.

"Well, things aren't looking good for her. She's been burned over 60% of her body and she'll probably never walk again. We did all we could." The Doctor said, solemnly.
"Oh, Doctor, is there anything you can do? Anything at all?" Melanie's Mom said.
The doctor sighed.
"Well, there is one thing. We have this experimental rejuvenation chamber the engineers have been working with. We're not sure if it's safe, though." The doctor said.
"I don't care, just save my baby!" Mom shouted, tears in her eyes.
She was given some consent forms, stating that if the procedure killed Melanie she couldn't sue. Melanie's bed was wheeled off by the nurses to the rejuvenation chamber.
"All right, first customer. Let's see what we can do!" The engineer who ran the chamber said.
Melanie would be among the first patients tested in it.

The rejuvenation chamber was turned on and Melanie's body began to change. Her burns quickly went away and her legs soon healed.
"Hey! It's working!" The engineer said.
"Sweet Christmas it's working! You're a miracle!" The doctor said, patting his engineer friend on the back.
The rejuvenation chamber wasn't done, though. Melanie quickly began to lose height. Her breasts shrank she regressed into a more childlike form.
"What's going on? Why's she shrinking? Turn it off!" The doctor said.
"I'm trying!" The engineer said.
The machine was shut off but the damage was done. Melanie was regressed into the body of a small child, one that appeared no older than four. Her hospital gown was far too large for her now, and lie over her in a crumple heap. Her dressings for her wounds sat uselessly on her now-pristine fully-healed body.
"Ooh, how are we gonna explain this one?" The engineer said.
"Well, it was an experiment. The mom signed the release forms, this is what she gets." The doctor said, shrugging his shoulders.
They sent in a nurse to take her back to the experimental observation unit for monitoring.

_______________________________________________________

Melanie woke up some time later with a terrible headache. The room seemed to be spinning.
"Ooh... what happened?" She groaned.
She sat up feeling somewhat off, although she wasn't sure why. Last thing she remembered was getting wasted at the party. Then the little girl looked around.
"Oh... Oh no, I'm in a hospital." She said.
Then she looked down at her body.
"Eek! I'm naked!" Melanie cried out.
Her body was completely bare. An IV line was in her arm and a catheter tube was in her crotch to collect her urine output. Then, Melanie noticed how her body had changed.
"Oh... Oh no! What happened to by legs They're so short! And my boobs? They're gone!" The girl said.
Melanie began to panic. A nurse quickly noticed and came in.
"Mel! Mel! Calm down." The nurse said.
"What happened to me?" Melanie asked.
"You were in a car accident, a really bad one. We only saved you because we tried an experimental procedure. Only thing is, you got turned into a little kid as a side effect. We're monitoring you right now to see if anything else happens." The nurse said.
Melanie scratched at her crotch.
"Well, can you get this... whatever it is out of me. It's really uncomfortable and itchy." Melanie said.
The nurse smiled.
"Sure thing, sweet pea." She said.
The nurse carefully removed the catheter and put little Melanie in a diaper. The urine collected was sent to the labs to be studied.
"So... my best friend, Alicia. I was with her. Is she okay?" Melanie asked.
